benefitsReview: ostensibly this will halt or even reverse the effects of male pattern baldness so far one month in there is not great deal to report expected my hair loss to temporarily increase as had read in the literature that as dormant hair follicles reactivate they push dead hairs out in order to form new ones in other word hair in dead follicle will linger for few months and reactivation of the follicle will push out the old hair to make room for the new so far this has not occurred the product must be taken for up to two years for any noticeable hair growth to take place so really have not been on it long enough to judge its re growth potential in terms of halting the process however must say there are fewer hairs in my brush each morning so it is possible the drug is having an effect already will post fuller report in another forty seven months suppose
sideEffectsReview: i was surprised to experience brief blinding headaches in the upper left rear quadrant of my head like mini seconds long burst of pressure that felt like blunt object suddenly trying to explode out of my skull this pressure would subside and would go about my day am told headaches are not one of the usual side effects so it may be an unrelated fluke however have never had such an experience before and it only manifested within about forty eight hours of my first taking the drug and for seventy two hours thereafter the sudden and sporadic bursts of acute pain subsided however but would caution anyone taking this drug for the first time to be on the lookout especially if driving or in public place with bright lights and lot of noise around
commentsReview: overall whether am having some sort of placebo effect reaction or not my subjective impression is that hair loss has slowed or stopped and that the hair remaining appears fuller presented my symptoms to the doctor and she issued prescription that same day which filled that afternoon at local pharmacy and began taking immediately the formulation was prescribed was milligram although believe the usual prescription is for milligrams and can go as high as milligrams my case was mild to begin with so it may be difficult to judge results however other than the mild side effects described above which subsided within three days must say overall that my experience has been positive one

commentsReview: i was told by my doctor and pharmacist that this was non addictive medication but when quit taking it the withdrawal symptoms were extreme had cold chills severe body aches diarrhea nausea headache heart palpitations anxiety sweating dizziness vomiting and depressed feelings got refill prescription to gradually come off of it after that and it occurred once again have never had substance abuse issues but after doing some research learned that it is opiate based and highly addictive have never felt that kind of pain and sickness in my life and pray never do again have heard similar experiences from others as well would not recommend this drug and do not believe that it is not addictive from now on will do my homework before take anything else now use otc pain relievers and encourage everyone who reads this to do the same before beginning treatment with tramadol or any pain reliever

benefitsReview: chantix did effectively reduce the urge to have cigarette taken twice per day was most effective but side effects precluded that dosage for this patient see below chantix was taken in the morning and patient rarely if ever even thought of wanting or needing cigarette during the day in the evening however when the second pill was due to be taken but was not and especially if patient had an alcoholic beverage the urge to smoke returned with vengence though few puffs were all it took to kill the urge when patient stopped taking chantix after year of use the urge for nicotine returned
sideEffectsReview: the side effects for patient were an upset stomach directly after taking pill and very disturbing and vivid dreams patient found that regarding the stomach upset it was less important to have food in your stomach before taking the pill stomach still got upset than to actually take the pill in the midst of eating e eat some food take the pill then eat some more this method of taking the pill virtually eliminated the stomach upset problem as to the vivid dreams that is why the patient only took one pill in the morning and did not take the pill in the evening although patient still occasionally had vivid dreams the incidence was far less often than when taking the pill twice per day
commentsReview: chantix was prescribed per the guidelines noted by the manufacturer as noted above the dosage was altered by the patient to alleviate negative side effects although stop smoking plan was packaged with the initial prescription the patient stopped participating in the follow up due to the lack of urges for cigarettes this however may be why the patient was on the prescription for year versus few months

benefitsReview: before lexapro was so depressed could not function forced myself to work and would come home exhausted had suicidal ideation and severe anxiety had bouts of depression before but was never treated my separation and death of my mother and loss of my job in one years time pushed me past what could get myself out of was irritable unsociable had no desire to eat lost lbs that could stand to lose in months cried all the time started lexapro months ago almost began at mg and it was upped to mg feel like am starting to have my life back laugh again genuinely can get up for work can socialize still have days where feel like crying and am very scared but it passes quickly have almost regained my general sense of optimism again was always happy go lucky have no ideation anymore lexapro is giving me my life back it is like someone cleaned really dirty window can see things more clearly now and do not ruminate as much as did or have guilt feelings that are inappropriate it saved my life
sideEffectsReview: i have some difficulty sleeping waking up in the night sometimes have diarrhea but not enough so it stops me from taking it have not had any weight gain but do feel bloated sometimes once in awhile get weird high feeling which passes very quickly
commentsReview: i have found that have to take it at night because of the sedating effect it seems to have on me but that is not problem was on mg and ramped up to mg fairly quickly which was like shock to my body that or days were like haze but stuck with it and it passed am on it for almost months now and am feeling much more like myself

benefitsReview: without question actiq is an extremely effective drug if you are in chronic severe pain and have no responsibilities actiq relaxes the body and the brain becomes numb and able to handle ongoing pain effectively it is fast acting in the subcutaneous lollipop form and within minutes you are comfortable the flavor is also quite pleasant
sideEffectsReview: actiq when taken as directed induces feeling of numbness and slurred speech is common thinking becomes confused and it is not unusual to fall asleep in mid sentence actiq slows breathing and causes extreme tiredness actiq are highly addictive and it is literally impossible to stop taking them without medical detoxification actiq delivered in subcutaneous form causes the teeth to rot after extended use of more than months
commentsReview: actiq should only be taken by individuals who are in severe chronic pain where tolerance to the drug will not become problematic it needs to be closely monitored and locked away out of reach of children or any adult who may have problems with addiction my chronic pain condition was followed by pain center at reputable hospital the use of opioids were used only after all other treatments for my condition had failed unfortunately once actiq was introduced to me my medical problems worsened although my pain was under control was unable to function responsibly began dealing with symptoms of withdrawal whenever did not take it which at times became worse than my actual pain and discomfort became more of patient to my family and on side note at age lost molars due to the ingredients present in the lollipops was taking had no choice but to be hospitalized for an inpatient medical detox in order to safely get this horrible drug out of my body fortunately my husband and were fortunate enought to have the money to go through this detox program have no memory of years of my life thanks to an ignorant negligent doctor and the drug actiq believe it or not my painful conditions are now completely under control now and am able to care for my husband and children and work after my experience with actiq no longer believe in the use of pharmaceutical products as whole and owe my good health to diet exercise and several natural supplements have never felt better in my life

benefitsReview: completely controlled nausea and vomiting

commentsReview: i was dealing with unrelenting nausea and vomiting for about five months combination of other drugs was tried and they had limited ability to control the nausea had lost lot of weight and was at the point where the weight loss had left me pale and weak when zofran was added to the list of drugs was given had immediate relief and was able to stop taking several of the other drugs now take zofran in the morning and evening and have stopped an unwanted weight loss and can enjoy eating again recently had biopsy where had to have nothing in my stomach for twelve hours the prescribed pain killers after the procedure immediately brought back the vomiting and my friend reminded the nurse that usually used zofran for that within ten minutes after giving me dose the nausea was gone and was able to get much needed rest

benefitsReview: marked reduction in hyperpigmented age spots marked reduction in wrinkles around mouth and eyes skin surface became much smoother and softer truly turned back time visible results within weeks and first months were remarkable but over the last year the benefits have continued and areas of brown discoloration thought would need laser therapy are almost cleared up also had some scar dents that have cleared up and or mostly gone
sideEffectsReview: dryness redness irritation and peeling it took gradual working up to the dosage without having serious redness itching pain dryness sensitivity had already been on retin so my skin was already acclimated somewhat and yet still had side effects discovered that it is most important to wait at least min after washing your face before applying and apply only the very least amt necessary to have the thinnest of layers more than that and you just get peeling and imperative not to use soap change to cleanser cetaphil or other also an hour or two after applying add strong moisturizer with time needed stronger daytime moisturizer too redness itching burning decreased significantly within months but skin remains highly sensitive and prone to dryness sunscreen is must and it was hard to find one that did not make my skin sting though most of the time that stinging did not last long mins overall though with patience and time and not pushing and rushing things it was well worth it oh and sometimes like when travelled to dry locations had to stop treatment temporarily or had severely dry and peeling skin have since discovered vaseline as great preventative for that

benefitsReview: a more positive outlook and much easier social interaction introversion diminished and friendly extroversion became more natural it was easier to start and finish projects because energy previously wasted on negative thoughts and actions was now available for constructive purposes
sideEffectsReview: a total loss of any sexual sensation prior to treatment interest in sex was low but paradoxically when feeling of psychological well being produced renewed interest in sex the drug also removed the physical ability to engage in it orgasm was impossible and physical arousal was too weak to be effective the worst part was withdrawal following treatment it took at least months of extremely gradual tapering off to withdraw and was on low dose any attempt to withdraw faster would produce chaotic mood swings from hysterical laughter to violent yelling rages every emotion however mild was magnified exponentially sexual sensation also went off the scale with such hypersensitivity that ejaculations happened spontaneously without any physical stimulation sneeze or yawning stretch would morph into an immediate ejaculating orgasm without any erection throughout the withdrawal period sensation of electric brain shocks extending to the arms and trunk would accompany any quick eye movement
commentsReview: just the one pill each morning this medication is such double edged sword that could not recommend it the long term dangers of sustained treatment are too great as evidenced by the severe withdrawal effects it really arewires your brain and those effects may be unpredictable from person to person

benefitsReview: helped me be able to leave the house for the first time in months quickly reduced my anxiety and did not have any attacks
sideEffectsReview: barely any despite some slight confusion
commentsReview: this medication and other benzodiazepines has gotten bad reputation because some irresponsible people have ruined it for those that actually need it if people would take this drug as prescribed there would not be as many problems and it would not carry the stigma it does now started having panic attacks when turned and the condition soon worsened into full blown panic disorder year later could not hold down job and was agoraphobic tried counseling and medications like zoloft and lexapro the side effects from those made me feel worse than did just not taking them finally my doctor decided to put me on alprazolam as needed it has been life saver for me would take the lowest dose mg and be able to leave my house for the first time in months visited friends went to restaurants and did everything used to do before my disorder finally felt like had my life back would take one whenever anticipated situation where could have an attack or when felt one coming on already sometimes did not even need all of the mg and could break it in half too many people abuse this medication by upping their dosage without doctor is consent or using it when they do not need to and now you are almost treated like criminal at some pharmacies and doctor is offices when they learn you are taking it because they think you are druggie much prefer this medication over any of the ssris which have horrible side effects felt like zombie on those medications had no sex drive at all and did not have any energy whatsoever the doctors tell you those side effects will go away with use but for days to even weeks you feel times worse than you did before it is just not worth it mg of alprazolam as needed for anxiety has helped me get my life back on track and really helped save me from spending days and nights locked away in my house highly recommend this medication for responsible people who just need something in crutch and do not want to go on long term ssris that leave you feeling drained and lifeless yes counseling and therapy are better alternative to medication but the problem is always finding good counselor and sometimes even then they just do not work have seen counselors and all of them have failed to help me with anything all did was waste copay each visit to have them tell me things that sounded like they came from an inspirational booklet taken as prescribed or as needed this drug is wonderful

commentsReview: i started to take wellbutrin xl at about six months of pregnancy and continued for approx six months when the baby was about three months old usually took it in the morning but often times forgot and took it later in the day none of this seemed to affect how well it worked were it not for the fact that it is so expensive and that it can be toxic to the body would take it every day please do not reveal my email address really value my privacy thank you

commentsReview: i began getting cold sores about years ago when was would get them times per year especially when the weather changed my doctor prescribed me mg tablet to take of them in the morning and at night at the onset of cold sore it helped but the sore still ran its ugly course even if caught it right at the tingling point before it came out when was went on birth control after about year of being on yaz began getting cold sores every month told my doctor but she did not think it was from the birth control even though read that bc suppresses your immune system and anything that does that can allow for more instances of cold sores went off the yaz for months and still got cold sores during those two months so maybe she was right she then prescribed valtrez mg once per day and have been taking that since still like clockwork get cold sore every single month either right before during or after my period so think it is hormonal something is triggering them every month have changed my diet completely take mg of lsyine each day have tried the red marine algae also no difference am high stress personality anyway which does not help my doctor prescribed mild sedative just to take the edge off and it does work great but still the cold sores come like clockwork just do not get it am starting new job soon where will actually have to go to an office each day for the last years have been road warrior so have been able to get around having to see people by making my own hours especially if cold sore errupts now do not know what will do it scares me and am stressed over that as well which does not help feel plagued do not know what else to try maybe acyclovir

sideEffectsReview: i took wellbetrin xl for little while but did not like it because felt like my emotions were on rollercoaster ride went back to the generic form of wellbutrin sr and felt better would like to try the name brand of wellbutrin since have heard that it is actually better than the generic do not recall any bad side effects except little dry mouth
commentsReview: i take tablet in the morning an tablet at night everyday when am able to afford it intend to try the brand name of this product to see if it will help with my libido now since have had hysterectomy and am experiencing low libido weight gain and depression of different kind than experienced in the beginning

commentsReview: the plan was permanent solution to my occasional flare ups of sciatica my physician basically stated that there was no cure for my pain therefore needed to be placed on prescription regimen that would hopefully reduce the occurrence and or frequency of sciatica each bottle contained day supply with enough refills to last me an entire year have herniated discs one at l l and the other at s the herniation at l l was causing pressure on my sciatic nerve which runs down the length of the left leg for me this drug was not effective perhaps if had continual pain would learn to live with the side effects did stop taking any medications for my condition and am learning to cope without prescriptions at this time it appears that eventually will need to take medication but want to avoid feeling doped up for as long as possible

benefitsReview: none went from lbs down to lbs did have reoccuring episodes tia like diagnosed as tia for lack of conclusive evidence or further investigation now believe it was mostly stress and menopause related issues
sideEffectsReview: i do not know that all side effects were attributable to the clonozapam alone or combination of one or all drugs did take just the clonozapm and lovastatin the first year regardless everytime looked up symptom on the web it always pointed to ms my neurologist did say we should investigate it but we never did anyway could not sleep for days on end had excessive hand tremors voice tremors unsteady gait tintinnitus eyesight problems urinary problems memory problems and bunch more can not even recall at the moment weaned myself off the medicine in months time and am very much improved but only after months and possibly years of being removed from all the problems would like to mention that at one point in time took the cholesterol drug that dr jarvis promotes can not remember the name and had to quit within the first week as it gave me pains in the front of my thighs that could take your breath away know for fact that that symptom was in fact attributable to that drug good effect that came from that drug though was the almost immediate shrinkage of my breast cysts had many on both sides upon starting on that drug could actually feel them draining dissapating or whatever you might call it they have not returned so am very thankful for that aspect of the drug because of the leg pain though found it intolerable
commentsReview: i am not sure what you mean as already told you that was being treated for tia like seizures with the clonozapam and aggrenox as blood thinner for the same also took lovastatin for high cholesterol in the course of all these medications ended up getting divorce the drugs did not lower my cholesterol they made me more nervous and made me question what on earth was wrong with me now weigh more than ever have and started to gain wieght almost immediately after getting off of the drugs could use to lose lbs but am not worried about it as am so much healthier than was during the time was on all of the drugs hope this has helped you in some way am sorry that can not be more specific but am in hurry to put all of that behind me and build healthier drug free future am very much proponent of natural medicines these days

benefitsReview: suboxone is beneficial for two reasons it eliminated the opiate withdrawal when was kicking my original drug of choice as maintenance drug suboxone eliminates the cravings that would normally have for opioids as well as blocks the effects of agonist opioids heroin oxycodone etc so that there is no temptation to take these drugs instead of struggling every day to avoid taking opioid drugs and all of the terrible thing that come with being in active addiction can take suboxone and move on with life suboxone may have quite literally saved my life
sideEffectsReview: my only major complaint is that since suboxone is an opioid though different from heroin oxy etc it causes constipation due to suboxone is opioid blocking effect if pain medication were needed in hospital emergency setting there could be complications if came in to the er with broken arm and they gave me shot of morphine it would do absolutely nothing though this has not been an issue for me yet
commentsReview: i am drug addict and although went to rehab to get off of opiate drugs just could not seem to stop so went on suboxone which is new alternative to methadone treatment while methadone is normal agonist opioid agonist means it gets use high it can be dispensed to drug addicts to keep them from withdrawing from their drug of choice because the methadone lasts so long but methadone must be taken every day at clinic and cannot be taken home addicts can still use drugs while on methadone if they choose too it is extremely difficult to get off of and methadone still gets users high suboxone is great alternative because it can be prescribed and bought at the pharmacy so you can take it at home it takes care of your drug cravings but it does not get you high not exactly anyways but it does satisfy the opiate receptors enough and it is really not all that hard to get off of if you must the withdrawals are are very manageable

commentsReview: i was prescribed this medication when the medication had been taking for and half years became ineffective was not informed of any side effects every time went to my gp to discuss symptoms which was worried about they just patronised me no longer take any medication for my condition and although do not consider myself to be well some of my symptoms have reduced the others such as incontinence dry skin lack of natural seretions am just trying to live with or trying to find products which hope will one day help me

commentsReview: i have dealt with anxiety since was kid as well as obsessive thinking it continued to build until was and had major panic attack which could not calm down from my psychiatrist put me on paxil cr and worked up to mg the dosage made big difference though still had moderate levels of anxiety but could function about year and half ago was hit with another major attack that send me into relapse for about months then upped my dosage to mg and within week felt fine even better than felt before now year and half later found myself in another relapse and after week released that all this time was not at high enough dosage because my anxiety and obsessive thoughts would still creep in and cause me distress so my psychiatrist agreed that was not at my ideal dosage and am now taking two mg in the morning which equals mg which is still fairly moderate dosage considering other patients that were on to even mg just started taking it so should start feeling even better within about week or two have accepted that may need to be on this for the long haul which is fine look at is as nutrition for the brain or like taking insulin for diabetes it allows me function and enjoy life

benefitsReview: at first could actually sleep the sleep issue has been life long and various natural things helped but not always as stress increased nothing helped not even the ativan
sideEffectsReview: loss of energy huge increase in anger and irritability over seemingly non issues personality changes to being more depressed and pessimistic world view was negative and everyone was an asshole did not want to do anything or try anything or go out not even things normally that were turn ons ie movies dancing sex food after months on the drug it helped not at all and sleep was down to hours per nite
commentsReview: very simple just take drug at night before bed doctor prescribed for no more thatn nights per week but as sleep deprivation increased so did the taking of the ativan sublingual helped better than pill took drug up to nights per week ran out of ativan at some point and realized after days that was sleeping better and felt better mentally emotionally and physically realized that the drug had severely affected his personality and motivation sex drive and pleasure increased with each week off the ativan swore to never use it again because the difference in how he felt was like night and day once he got off the pills

condition: infection from grazing an ankle on coral
benefitsReview: i very mildly scratched my left ankle right on the protruding bone while snorkeling in the ocean the abrasion was so small that did not do any first aid other than wash the area off when showering over the next days the are became inflamed and began to apply antibiotic powder to try to dry the inflamed area on the th morning the tiny scratch had developed to the point were the abrasion was an oozing sore about the size of quarter and my foot was red and swollen making it impossible to put on shoe immediately went to local doctor who prescribed amoxilin tablets the drug was very effective and the effects could be felt within hours
sideEffectsReview: the drug upset my stomach mildly otherwise no side effects noticed
commentsReview: i was given day prescription which is the reason am submitting this report believe antibiotics should be prescribed in course of days this practice as far as know was very popular in hong kong and it still might be general practice in my case did not want to return to the doctors office and be charged again for another consultation purchase additional amoxilin as was not covered by medical insurance at that time instead went to local pharmacy with the package of antibiotics received from the doctors office and asked if could buy tablets they were more than happy to sell them to me at fraction of the cost paid at the doctors office and followed through with day course the results were very positive and within hours could feel relief and knew that the infection was being affected by the amoxilin by the rd day the swelling was greatly reduced and other than nasty wound on my ankle bone felt very good continued the remaining days and besides scar on my ankle at the site of the infection completely recovered

benefitsReview: after having this virus for many years resolved that was going to look for possible suppressant as the medical community acknowledges once you have contacted the virus it will be awaiting an opportunity to break through especially in times of stress or tiredness prior to taking valtrex was having viral herpes attack for about days at time at least four times year sometimes times year valtrex is an amazing drug my experience has been that if you take tablet each day you will not transmit the virus to your partner provided that you pay attention to the first signs of the virus and abstain from intimate sexual encounters for five days or so or until you can feel or see no more signs of the virus to be honest it frustrates me that so many people suffer from this virus but are not informed as to how to treat the problem hope this helps and gives encouragement for me it has been on par with miracle since taking the drug once daily have had one only one potential outbreak in the past two and half years at the onset of the potential outbreak increased the dose to tablets day twice day day for four days this treatment suppressed the outbreak and the symptoms which felt appeared very slightly and then disappeared within hours
sideEffectsReview: to be honest have had no side effects that can determine
commentsReview: tablet day in the morning if symptoms beginning tablets three times day for days or until symptoms have disappeared

benefitsReview: subutex is mostly used to help opiate addicts withdrawal more comfortably from opiod drugs such as vicodin oxycodone and even heroin however was started on subutex because my doctor and were having no luck finding another med that would augment my current depression medications of effexor xr and adderall which were only partially working my doctor had found research suggesting that subutex because it is partial opiate agonist itself although much different in its properties compared to what most think of when thinking opiate binds to one of the opiate receptors in the brain responsible for mood my doctor has always been on the cutting edge of current research and was extremely open minded in trying this med with me and to welcomed relief as well have had almost all good results from this medication it has definitely aided in the treatment of my very treatment resistent depression the following are the benefits that have noticed from taking subutex quick acting because subutex is sublingual dissolves under your tongue it gets into your system immediately and does not have to be processed by your digestive system first gentle effects have definitly not experienced any highs just subtle but noticeable improvement in feeling of wellbeing also helps somewhat with anxiety by having calming effect in normal doses this happens without any tiredness have not noticed any of the side effects that have found with other psychiatric medications such as weight gain loss personality changes sexual effects etc also in case anyone is worried that subutex is partial opiate agonist must emphasize that this med does not build tolerance or make you want need to increase dosage have been on this dose for four years without ever even thinking about needing more however you must understand that as is the case with all psychiatric medications you cannot simply stop taking this medication without tapering your dose first or you will experience withdrawal effects the one saving grace about subutex though is that it has very long half life and will remain in your system long enough to prevent any type of withdrawal even if you miss day or two of medication

i am when was in th grade became ill with lyme disease it was so severe that was out of school for two years and instead of going back to school and graduating hs at the age of got my ged and joined the army had mos that did not require much thinking on your own and because of that was very successful made rank quick was very respected became the nco of the year twice became drill sgt and because of all my military success had no problem getting into tier one college out of all my deployments and undescribable situations ive been in nothing compared with the stress of college once identifying that had learning problem was prescribed vyvanse am now going into my senior year and am ranked in the top of my class vyvanse has given me focus and direction with the good comes the bad have lost alot of muscle think it all went to my brain become aggressive and some times its hard to put into check before lose control and always have the desire to drink alcohol for the most part am able to have self control but its not easy plan on continuing vyvanse through grad school would recommend this drug you just need to have good sense of self awareness and keep your eye on the prize

commentsReview: i have prescription for albuterol for sports related asthma usually get the proair inhaler but the pharmacist insisted this was the same and gave it to me the first day had it went for run as usual about minutes in my chest begins to tighten and cannot breath took puff of the ventolin hfa inhaler no effect stopped running took another puff no effect still cannot breath am now bent over with my hands on my knees struggling to intake air took several more puffs from the inhaler no effect am now struggling to remain conscious am getting light headed and everything in my vision is pale begin to lay on my back taking few more puffs of the inhaler no effect my throat is now beginning to seize from the sheer force it takes to inhale tablespoon sized breaths have headache and hear high pitched whining try several more puffs of my inhaler no effect lay on the ground doing controlled breathing for several minutes tried puff of ventolin hfa here and there with no effect so gave it up am laying wondering if this is my last day on earth about minutes of pure agony later catch my breath slightly now have an enormous headache and am dizzy get to my feet and start to walk toward my apartment across the street along the way my chest seizes up couple more times and couple more times use the inhaler no effect now have to wait another month before can afford proair inhaler before can even exercise again think ventolin is for underdeveloped little kids who think they have asthma but actually do not have real asthma and this stuff almost killed me the puff that comes out of it is nearly invisible the puff from proair inhaler is actually noticeable and puff about x more comes from the proair compared to the ventolin even waking up in the morning the slight tightness have then ventolin does nothing for my girlfriend does not understand why wheeze before and after use the ventolin well it is because it does not work for me in fact it almost killed me everything in this story is true but may have taken more puffs from the inhaler than listed any is feel free to contact me thecrookfromthebrook at yahoo com thank you and take care

sideEffectsReview: i do not feel as though have any discernible side effects with pentasa but when paired with purinethol do have side effects such as extreme fatigue and headaches leading me to believe the problem lies with the purinethol do have intermittent constipation which could be attributable to number of factors in my life but is also side effect of pentasa also have mild headaches muscle pain and anxiety which are listed as possible side effects with pentasa but to the best of my knowledge these symptoms were occuring prior to my starting pentasa perhaps the pentasa exacerbates the problems do not know know that do worry about kidney problems which is one of the more serious side effects of this medicine
commentsReview: twelve years ago became ill with what was diagnosed two years later as crohn is disease have used variety of medications ranging from more serious drugs prednisone remicade to less harmful drugs metronidazole ciprofloxacin asacol etc have been on the pentasa for about years during which time was using purinethol for several years year or so ago weaned myself off of the purinethol and remained on the highest dose of pentasa for my weight and am doing well knock on wood have constipation issues as opposed to my previous diarrhea problems which may be attributable to the pentasa and is manageable through diet and over the counter aids

sideEffectsReview: it took time to figure out when to take the medicine from everything have read am supposed to take it in the morning but that made me wide awake even at night and it interfered with my meal schedule so now take it around m still sleep well something new for me and can easily wake up feeling alert throughout the day have never felt this way before it is awesome
commentsReview: synthroid mcg liothyronine mcg both daily around m magnesium mg vitamin d alternating between mg and mg daily my body is not absorbing the vit d very well will get rechecked in week have these levels checked by your doctor of people are deficient in vitamin and low in magnesium these are essential to your body is wellness

benefitsReview: i took alprazolam for months for extreme anxiety depression it did work considerably in the beginning however would occasionally sleep the day away if taken in the morning would wake up from naps with terrible disposition it did work considerably for anxiety initially but it is very easy to self medicate and take considerably higher dosages then prescribed in retrospect should not have taken the medication because was already on medication to come off of opiates because have an addictive personality discussed this with my dr and he told me that alprazolam with suboxone worked well together later found out that the two drugs were dangerous to take together because of the potential of respiratory depression also have found out that benzodiazepines especially alprazolam can be very addictive which can have much worse withdrawal than any opiate think alprazolam can be very useful medication if taken as prescribed and only taken on prn basis do not believe there are any instances where alprazolam should be taken twice day unless you have signs of extreme anxiety all day every day if you have an addictive personality like myself think if you consider alprazolam at all it should be used very judiciously but exhaust other alternatives to alprazolam like buspar which has no addiction potential however think it tends to be pretty much useless unless taken in high dosages suggest talking to two or more dr before initiating regimen only say this because know what alprazolam withdrawal entails and there are very unpleasant side effects which can be life threatening also alprazolam is not effective for very long it is really only good for extreme panic attacks and helps quickly then it loses its effect within approx hours will also say gladly that benefitsReview: botox was administered to help reduce the lines appearing on my forehead and at the outer side of my eyes crows feet the and unit injections were effective in reducing the lines for period of about months but there were noticeable adverse reactions with the units the units were as effective but without the spasms noted under treatment details of the times units were injected the last time the botox had been reconstituted for more than the recommended hours there was concern of effectiveness but actually it seems as though the botox was more quickly effective and seemed more effective in reducing the lines that the previous unit injection more detail is covered under the treatment details

commentsReview: the first use of botox was units injections were injections on the upper mid forehead injections were given around the outer side of each eye within hours it was difficult to close my eyes the forehead was totally stiff upon smiling and talking my cheek muscles were noticably twitching eye lids twitched friends noticed my face spasming make note of this issue because of the fact concerning the stability of the botox realize that botox is available in or unit vials which are then reconstituted the nurse stated that he had to use all of the botox apparently he only had the unit vial because it would be instable after hours since this time have had units of botox at two different times injected in the same areas stated above there was no adverse spasms be definite freezing of the forehead muscles the units and units lasted about months before lines started to appear again due to frowning smiling etc recently had only units injected mid upper forehead in injections upon raising my eyebrows needed thought injections more lower mid section since the upper forehead did not move after one month find that have few lines above my eyebrow but in general my forehead is less lined my main concern is if physicians agents have only unit vials available and they are only injecting client what do they do with the residual is this why there is such high cost per unit it makes me wonder if physicians are freezing or using the botox beyond the hour expiration time have manufacturers ever thought of packaging smaller unit packages to assure clients are getting the real stuff this last physician did not have the manufacturer is bottle for me to see only small syringe already pre filled

know that opiates are the best for bad chronic pain which experience every day in my life my doctor and talked about cymbalta which can be used to tone down the pain level sensors in the brain so am not experiencing so much pain also have high levels of depression and anxiety recently my aunt and uncle passed away which they practically raised me when was born in ireland and my sister is deaths was even more of add on felt myself slipping into deep black hole and was looking for cheap thrills just to keep myself from going crazy literally anyways it has been my third day on this prescription and feel like new person find myself enjoying simplistic things and taking initiative in my life to pursue my goals and education am currently unemployed and as young adult it is very hard to maintain money flow with no job am enrolled and taking college courses which have more semesters left before receive my degree in one of my classes chemistry we are assigned science experiment mine will be for benefitsReview: we are not sure we wonder if it is really controlling the seizures at all we are hoping our daughter can get testing to determine if her seizures are catamenial in nature she was on carbatrol with complete control but was switched to keppra due to her upcoming marriage much lower risk of birth defects and ability to use birth control pills while on it she was completely weaned off of carbatrol at one point and went almost weeks with no seizure activity she also went months with no seizure activity with keppra before having tonic clonic seizure due to her history of seizures started at the age of couple of months after she started her period and the ability to go for long periods of time without problems we wonder if she is having extreme spikes in estrogen when she ovulates from time to time we hope that our neurologist will work with an endocrinologist and gynocologist to see if there is some validity to our theory the goal is to get her back under complete control

benefitsReview: the benefits were numerous do not have panic attcks for the first time in yrs and if do they are less than seconds have not had mixed state or very rapid cycling since getting on it years ago these symptoms continued to get more severe until got on this drug every episode was worse and lasted longer this drug gave me my life back lost my job and wound up in psychiatric inpatient care but have become steadily better since first taking the drug have to admit to get to the point am at now took years but it is better then was and it is better than not getting better at all the longer am on seroquel the better feel also am able to sleep because of seroquel at the worst when went into the hospital could not sleep at all which was making my episode even worse sleeping drugs and benzodiazepines such as valium that were given to me made me feel horrible very tired the next day and even made me panic anticonvulsants and even other psychotics gave me panic attacks made me antsy or made me so tired could not even function in day to day life seroquel does not make me real tired but it has made sleep schedule possible again also do not feel too tired in the morning
sideEffectsReview: there are side effects of course as there are with any drug have little more stomach troubles than what started with but that could be due to the lithium have also had about pounds of weight gain before the seroquel was thin with high metabolism my weight is steady now but at lbs higher than it used to be tried losing the weight but it has been impossible to get it off the drug does not make me groggy but know some people on it that it just knocks out
commentsReview: i have been on and off lithium and paxil for years tried zyprexa depakote triliptal and lamictal but these made meunfunctionally tired or had severe reactions to them have problem where drugs create severe reactions and sensitivity in me so dr give small amounts of several rather than mega dose of one tried risperdal but it gave me severe panic attacks and restlessness started out with an antipsychotic and lithium at the hospital to bring the mania and mixed states down later switched to seroquel and paxil was added to help with my anxiety and depression was on seroquel at lower dose than most mg to start mg lithium anymore than that makes me very sick even though the blood tests show it is within normal limits and paxil at mg now years later as am not in severe episode can get by on half the paxil mg seroquel and the lowest lithium possible to keep it in treatment range raise the doses if have to with permission of the nurse practitioner and take mg seroquel as needed throughout the day if need to for anxiety although do not need to very often the combination of seroquel paxil and lithium works best together for me

benefitsReview: i have long history in taking anti depressant drugs it started in high school with prozac and desipramine neither of which have anything positive to report in college after dangerous stint without treatment it resumed with luvox and later it was effexor finally after the scariest bout of all leading to stay in the hospital they put me on wellbutrin combined with rigorous therapy dbt dialectical behavioral therapy groups and much personal work got my head above water was able to work eat well and exercise regularly but many of the symptoms were still there thought that was the extent of what an anti depressant could do for me the rest of the work was up to me and maybe in about years might be able to feel happiness since then went off wellbutrin during cross country move was part of study for treatment resistant depression where it was recommended try cymbalta feel the cymbalta has actually influenced my negative thinking and given me more energy so now know that an anti depressant can potentially create better results than just keeping ones head above water
sideEffectsReview: none of the previous meds mentioned however did damn thing but cause me to shake be continuously thirsty and not be able to achieve orgasm the wellbutrin was great in that it did not cause any sexual side effects that was relief the ability to reach orgasm seems as if it should me basic right for every human being and the emptiness that replaces the disappearance of the bodies biological ability to feel good just does not seem right was very adament in telling my psychiatrist that did not want anything that caused sexual side effects which most anti depressants do the cymbalta causes the emptiness but honestly the improvement it has made in my mood and productivity make it worth it for now plus am not in meaningfully intimate relationship at the moment it seems to only cause and inability to reach inner orgasm however clitoral orgasm is still possible with vibrator and not human being recently they have added dose of wellbutrin to my regimen as an attempt to counteract the sexual side effect caused by the cymbalta do not yet know if this is working like said have no boyfriend so do not even know why am bothering really did it to see if the addition of wellbutrin would make me feel even better have not felt much difference
commentsReview: once month see psychiatrist although am in between doctors right now because my previous one left as they always seem to do have been without therapist for while now wanting to take break from the time and monetary commitment that therapy demands am beginning to think that now is good time to go back to it consider the jogging yoga healthy eating and vitamins take to be part of my treatment

condition: bipolar disorder with severe lows & fatigue,
benefitsReview: i do feel much more awake but still need nap everyday even after taking both of my doses with hours of sleep am still very fatigued but am able to think more clearly and even drive again my mood is much better and seems to be more stable than before the endless fatigue used to spin me out of control and send me into rage and the only way that could deal with the rage was to clean like mad crazy and put my focus on anything other than the real issues all the while never eating or drinking anything for weeks at time from there would become extremely manic and focus only on organization my eating disorder and cleaning this has not happened at all since taking provigal in combination with cymbalta did read that this medication is not recommended for people with history of mania ocd or eating disorders but feel that it is been very effective in the long run for me
sideEffectsReview: acne acne had bit of anxiety when first began taking it but that has since gone away my heart raced for couple of weeks but it is hard to tell if it really was the provigil simply because my heart often races at random had bit of trouble sleeping the first nights after taking provigil but this has not been problem at all since have lost some weight that had gained back just before starting provigil and this has left my husband and therapist little concerned but still get hungry and have not changed my diet but the provigil is the cause and have no doubt about it did not refill it for three weeks earlier this year and gained nearly pounds so this drug would be fairly effective for weightloss
commentsReview: my bipolar disorder is often at the lowest points more than the highest points anymore in the past switched moods much more rapidly and was given the diagnosis of rapid cycling bipolar disorder after my first daughter was born it only got worse weeks without any sleep then when my second daughter was born something changed within me couold not wake up at night to even hear her cry my husband took vacation time to stay home to let me rest relapsed worse than ever with my eating disorder and required my rd feeding tube and just could not function enough to even take care of myself normal life or even my baby girls was go into fits of rage from the sheer exhaustion and would clean for days and weeks without eating drinking sleeping or even sitting then would crash finally my doctor decided to jusy try provigil and it has helped great deal along with cymbalta am not sure why becasue according the everything know about both medications they are completely wrong for me however nothing else has worked thu far have taken everything this has been dream for me even if do not have as much pep in my step as would like am not blank lifeless useless zombie

benefitsReview: this is probably the best skin care product medicine available it is highly effective for both acne and photo aging it exfoliates the skin better than anything else thus unclogging the pores it also speeds up cell turnover which reduces keratinization preventing comedo formation it smooths out wrinkles makes the deep layers of skin dermis thicker increases collagen production etc you can read about all its benefits on pubmed it has been proven more effective than tretinoin retin for both acne and photoaging
sideEffectsReview: initially it is quite irritating that is why it is very important to start using it less often and with smaller applied amount do not overdose on tazorac or else your skin the upper horny layer statum corneum will become so thin and dry that it will crack thus you will actually create wrinkles rather than eliminate any if you take it slowly and gradually increase the dose you will not have that problem as the skin adjusts to it you should probably start using it only every rd or th day initially gradually increasing to every other day or even every day some people are able to use it twice day know cant in case you develop severe irritation you must use good moisturizer to prevent wrinkle formation if you are using it for acne and are using other products such as benzoyl peroxide as you should you should be even more careful as skin irritation is cumulative from the various drugs you will have to use lower dose bp such as because your skin will be exfoliated and more easily irritated
commentsReview: the gel is more effective than the cream in that it delivers higher dosage of the medication faster the cream however has lower side effects and it achieves more controlled release of the drug believe the cream is more appropriate for anti aging as it is more emollient neither the cream nor the gel are comedogenic so acne sufferers should not worry have used both the gel and the cream with both concentrations and am currently using the cream there is generic version available from an indian manufacturer called glenmark their product is called tazret it is virtually the same as the original

benefitsReview: i used to have near daily migraines tried every migraine medication on the market either they did not have any effect or was unable to tolerate them due to side effects with botox injections administered by very knowledgable neurologist who is also pain specialist am virtually migraine free for months

commentsReview: my neurologist injects the tiny cranial muscles as well as muscles along my neck and upper shoulder he uses tiny needle and injects very little at each site he determines where the trigger points are before administering the botox please note if using botox for migraines do go to neurologist who is experienced with migraine pain do not have this done by cosmetic surgeon

benefitsReview: opened lungs when breathing was difficult

benefitsReview: the lidoderm numbs my back for most of the day so that the pain is dulled dramatically the neurontin eventually blocked my pain so well was able to get out of bed after being stuck in it for months these two pain relievers work so very well together there is nothing that is going to take all of the pain away am also on other medication for this as well being able to walk around again finally was like what took you so long to figure it out what to do am not broken am hurt have children at home need to at least be mobile
sideEffectsReview: many of the medications take have side effect that affects your memory my short term memory is terrible can be asking for something as ordinary as fork pen etc and can not come up with the word at all will be able to later or the next day haven forgotten the word just can get it out of my brain the neurontin has also affected my eyes sometimes have problems focusing sometimes am able to read the phone book and othertimes need magnifying glasses this all started week after starting the medicine
commentsReview: i have torn lumbar disk have pain in my back that is constant and gets worse with overwork and high humidity have no feeling in my feet my right leg does not work correctly the neurontin is mainly attributable to the quality of life that have today then the other medications take all do their part the nerontin blocks the pain nerve signal from registering in my brain the methodone deals directly with the pain as does the lidoderm patch the muscle relaxer keeps my muscles from spontaneously contracting which they will do without the medication the anti depressents help me stay positive which is where want to be usually have sunny outlook and the medicine helps me keep it when my last medicine stopped working was depressed for total of months what waste of time

benefitsReview: i have taken this drug off and on for the past years have always had good results with it but wanted to go off it to have children then after my last child tried to make it without medication but realized could not am very careful about the medications take and do not like being stuck on anything however realized that needed help and my children needed happy mommy went back on prozac the generic form months ago and now feel better than have in years can cope with the daily stresses of life without losing my temper or my mind can face the responsibilities of each day without fear hopelessness or doubt can laugh and enjoy my children am truly new person am regretting not going back on this medication sooner
sideEffectsReview: honestly the only side effect have had is that it is harder to have an orgasm can still have them but it just takes longer do not really feel in the mood as much but that is very small detriment compared to what was experiencing before have had no other side effects whatsoever do not even feel mediciney or out of it at all and no stomach problems either

benefitsReview: valtrex tablets work by stopping the multiplication of the virus which causes herpes they can reduce the length and severity of an outbreak of herpes the duration of pain and shorten the time to healing of crusts associated with herpes valtrex tablets help the blisters to heal more quickly if you start taking them as soon as you feel an outbreak starting you may actually prevent the blisters from developing
sideEffectsReview: i did not have any observable or noticeable side effects while taking valtrex however was forewarned that valtrex has the following side effects headache gastrointestinal discomfort such as vomiting nausea diarrhoea constipation abdominal pain indigestion also because was taking valtrex to prevent outbreaks triggered by laser treatments was advised that valtrex causes sensitivity to uv light and my skin would be much more vulnerable to sunburn even during very short exposure to uv light
commentsReview: i took valtrex before laser treatment to prevent the outbreak of cold sores or herpes virus the first laser treatment without taking valtrex caused herpes cold sores breakout on my face around the chin area after consulting with my physician he prescribed valtrex to prevent the outbreaks in future laser treatments learned that the laser triggered the herpes outbreak since the virus is in dormant state until it is disturbed and activated by the laser was prescribed mg of valtrex to be taken days before the treatment the day of the treatment and three days after the treatment for total of seven days took the medication twice day and started this seven day regime each and every time had laser treatment to prevent any outbreaks

benefitsReview: the medicine was for contraceptive purposes which it achieved the medicine also regulated the periods and made them on more regular basis it also cleared my skin and helped with acne
sideEffectsReview: the only side effects included breast tendiness and slight headache during the first days of the period after stopping taking the contraceptive headaches stopped too
commentsReview: i took one pill day for days starting on the first day of the period tried to take the pill at approximately the same time each day to improve the effectiveness of the medication

commentsReview: treatment began with two mg tablets twice day but was reduced to once day after the first month due to extremely dry skin when sexual side effects began in month my dermatologist suggested using personal lubricant during sex which was never needed before treatment began and that the problem would clear up once was finished with the treatment began the treatment in febuary and finished september the problem with dry skin cleared up rapidly but continue to struggle with the sexual side effects as of june have been treating the vaginal dryness with an over the counter product called replens since january and this has helped considerably but it causes constant vaginal discharge am now able to have sex about once ever weeks but have yet to experience vaginal orgasm

commentsReview: hi am russian european race who has migrated from sweden to the usa have developed melasma dark spots under my eyes and on my forehead visited dermatologist in the usa fl about month ago he prescribed me tri luma that contains of hudroquinone have you ever read about hydroquinone asked him as investigated it found the information that hydroquinone has been banned in many european countries including france sweden and russia etc for concerns about increased cancer risk the fda admitted that the risk of using the drug is not known and more testing needs to be done in fact the fda also warned that hydroquinone has been linked to condition that disfigures the skin anyway tried the cream sample that the doctor gave to me he prescribed to use it twice week mondays and fridays it was terrible used it just once week on my pigment spots because my skin got red burning and after week it was peeling some doctors prescribe to use it once twice day put it on only once week ok after month treatments have the result my pigment spots have not been improved at all moreover the skin is burnt and now have very obvious dark red brown spots really look terrible can not put on any sunscreen because the skin is damaged by tri luma am so happy that did not buy the full size cream which costs and the insurance does not cover it do not want to buy cancer for thanks have also contacted russian and swedish doctors they have forbade to use it strongly they have suggested to use natural products such as juice of lemon parcley put camomile teabags on dark spots oatmeal etc and of course avoid the sun please be aware read more information online

benefitsReview: the effexor worked the first day took it for some time previously had felt paralyzed or too depressed to get much done the day began taking it noticed difference in that felt more able to get out of the house and able to cope with the difficulties of mothering children full time as said it worked the first day but continued to work better and better over the next weeks until worked up to my eventual dose started at mg and worked my way up to mg
sideEffectsReview: the only side effect noticed was that if for some reason forgot to take the effexor in the morning by the evening felt sort of dizzy in really weird way
commentsReview: i am not clear on what is wanted in this section will do my best and if you wish to email me with request for specific info will be happy to help was seeing psychiatrist years ago who thought effexor was worth try had been on prozac few yrs previous and although it worked really well after taking it for two years developed the side effect of experiencing arthritic pain in my hands that was the reason discontinued the use of prozac after being off the prozac or any other meds for year or two could feel myself sliding back into the black hole of depression and severe anxiety found doctor psychiatrist and he put me on effexor it was miracle was soooo happy to find something that worked so well and on the first try several years before had gone through what my family refers to as the year of hell when first began the journey of searching for an anti depressant that would work and not have side effects that kept me from functioning normally my treatment consisted of taking the mg of effexor and monthly visits to my psychiatrist to determine how well my effexor was working and to discuss other treatment options although could notice marked difference in my mood still felt that was not nearly as healthy mentally as needed to be would still have days when felt paralyzed and very anxious when discussed the problem with my psych he suggested that add luvox another anti depressant to my regimen that helped as well although there were two unpleasant side effects loss of sex drive and difficulty achieving orgasm and night sweats my doc prescribed mg of hytrin for the night sweats it worked and he recommended mg ginko biloba daily for the loss of sex drive it may have helped little but was never quite sure one other thing found beneficial for my anxiety was mg dexadrine it seemed contradictory to me that stimulant would calm me down but the very first day took it felt calm for the first time in my life up until then did not realize how severe my anxiety was because had never known what it was like to be without it but that very first day took it felt calmness come over me that was such relief always before had feeling inside that can only explain as the feeling one would get if one was late for an important meeting with one is boss sort of like am late gotta hurry oh no that was feeling that had always had and it had nothing to do with what my situation was late or early it made no difference for the first two weeks took the dexadrine did not pull my hair trichotillomania at all nor did even realize was not pulling as did not even think about it unfortunately did go back to pulling after that the side effects experienced with the dex is that it made me drowsy for about the first hour after took it and it made me feel like lost my spontaneity got lot more done and did not feel so panicked but was not as much fun for that reason stopped taking it regularly and took it maybe only half of the time after maybe year or two quit taking it altogether and when went back on it last year after having been off of it for about years it no longer worked as it had before it made me feel jittery as though would had way too much coffee it just made the anxiety worse am not sure if was supposed to tell about more than one medication for this survey however these four meds have mentioned were all sort of intertwined so it seemed appropriate for me to do so have taken myriad of other anti depressants in my quest to find one that would work and would be willing to share my experiences with those other meds as well just let me know if you want mori info

benefitsReview: i began suffering from heartburn in my late thirties this condition progressed to daily occurence not willing to avoid spicey foods my physician prescribed ranitidine recall he intially prescribed mg twice daily at one point he recommended mg twice aday but mg twice daily is working the dosage reduced the occurence of heartburn my symptoms to near zero

commentsReview: i take mg tablet in the morning before or during breakfast and then another at lunch this combination prevents heartburn throughout the day late night dinners may produce heartburn often will take tablet prior or immediately after as prevention also elevated my bed about at the head to prevent what had been fairly frequent events of stomach acid somehow working its way into my mouth at night this drug and the elevated bed has reduced this to very rare occurence and again often associated with late evening meals if do not take tablet in the evening

commentsReview: the benefits of effexor xr were terrific the side effects while taking it were just fine with me though my psychiatrist seemed alarmed about my heart rate and blood pressure that said the withdrawal was so atrociously horrible it simply was not worth taking would have rather taken drug that was half as effective without this uniquely gross withdrawal let me put this into perspective have gone through nicotine alcohol and speed withdrawal the last long time ago and the effexor was the worst and required hospitalization for the alcohol it took me between three and four months to taper off the drug tried to stop unsuccessfully at the regular dose then and then before deciding to just taper it down to dose so small had hard time believing it had any psychoactive effects at all even finally quitting taking the drug at all when would tapered down to th the initial dose experienced mild versions of the same awful withdrawal issues that had popped up before intermittent intense nausea previously full blown vomiting on previous quitting attempts night sweats what have read in effexor forums described inadequately as brain shivers though amusingly enough very little of the depression or anxiety rebound past the first few days of mg if were at suicidal or bed ridden level of depression this drug would be completely worth it even with the withdrawal otherwise am staying away from ssnri is for long time

sideEffectsReview: the side effects of this medication in combination with the patient is medical condition and current medications were tremendous and in my opinion contributed to the patient is death the patient started having delusions as well as other bizarre behavior and the family could not convince the patient otherwise the patient was also on renexa which is known to be strong inhibitor and believe caused the seroquel to attain toxic blood levels the family tried to contact the psychiatrist to discuss the problems but before this occurred the patient went into fib miles from hospital it was more than minutes before the life saving crew arrived at the scene and even longer before the patient arrived to the er for treatment the patient was pronounced dead on the scene
commentsReview: the patient was referred to the psychiatrist by his cardiologist secondary to depression and increasing insomnia the patient had been on welbutrin for years for depression and smoking cessation the psychiatrist kept the patient on welbutrin and added xanax for anxiety and seroquel for sleep at bedtime slowly the family started noticing strange behavior delusions and almost dementia type characteristics in the patient that occured over month period and began to get more severe the family attempted to talk about the changes with the patient but as true delusional behavior dictates the patient was unable to see any of the changes the forgetfulness clumsiness and personality changes such as irritability increased the family attempted to contact the psychiatrist but in interim the patient died of cardiac arrest even after talking to the psychiatrist after the patient is death the psychiatrist denied that seroquel had any affect on the situation the family and myself as the primary caretaker believe that seroquel was directly responsible for the patient is death we do not plan to seek legal retribution but hope that anyone that reads this will be more cautious about prescribing seroquel in someone that already has cardiac problems and to please be careful about it is possible interactions with other medications

commentsReview: initial mg was taken for only days due to severe daytime sleepiness in am found it nearly impossible to drag myself out of bed in am my morphine controlled release wears off within hours so staying in bed not advisable without another dose of morphine or percocet but the neurontin makes me want to keep sleeping when finally do wake up minimally after hours after fell asleep still felt tired and now in lot of back hip and sometimes even knee pain from laying in bed motionless for so long on side of body because of the sleepiness side effect do not take any during day since my md would not lower dosage from mg until next monthly visit bought empty size gel capsules at local health food store and painstakingly divided the dosage from the mg capsules into mg capsules initially this seemed to be good solution was able to continue having h of pain free sleep and getting up after h was easier but after only days at the lower mg dosage the excessive sleepiness after h of normal sleep continued so need to try cutting down the dosage even more have to take the dextroamphetamine controlled release to fully wake me up in am and once that wore off after hours in early evening am too tired to study for my classes overall would recommend this drug only for adults who do not have to drive to work or adults who can take naps during work hours or adults who are not trying to taking classes for credit am hoping the upcoming rfa procedure will allow me to stop taking the narcotics and neurontin and allow me to be able to work study and retain what learn in class especially short term memory

benefitsReview: taking the rivotril made me sleepy at first but then it just calmed me down enough to be able to cope with life was constantly anxious and scared and the rivotril made it possible for me to come down to relatively normal anxiety levels in safe situations whereas before did not have any situations considered safe it helped me sleep and made me feel more rested and in control got pregnant while taking it had been trying for years and honestly believe that being more relaxed helped me not only to get pregnant but to carry the baby as had had four miscarraiges previously started confronting situations that were uncomfortable to me before and was able to live reasonably normal life even though have become housebound feel the rivotril got me through very tough time in my life
sideEffectsReview: the rivotril did not have any side effects in the long run it made me bit sluggish at first however after taking it for few years and feeling no longer needed it found it impossible to stop taking it as the withdrawal symptoms were so bad have cut the dosage down considerably from mg at night to one then became nervous again and started taking again have tried several times to come off the drug completely but the results have been tremors and feeling sick along with high anxiety to the point of hardly being able to speak would always go back on it never felt needed more just coud not stop taking even small amount
commentsReview: i was told that panic attacks were caused by chemical imbalance in the brain in the same area that caused epileptic fits as rivotril is sedative and is given to people with epilepsy they had found that it also helped alleviate panic attacks was prescribed it for this reason am unable to take anti depressants which also stop panic attacks because of strong side effects so this was better choice for me at the time feel that it did the job but had known would be on it for the rest of my life am not sure would have started taking it but maybe if was desperate like was then would was concerned about taking it while pregnant but my child was normal she did have bad withdrawal symptoms though after stopped breast feeding her no one realized that was what was happening when she cried all the time for seemingly no reason back then it was unknown that going off the drug caused withdrawal as the drug had never been used short term only for epileptics for life she is now and perfectly normal however do feel guilty about having put her through that

benefitsReview: since was very young child suffered debilatating headaches often they became true migraines they would last for days and days sometimes weeks without stop missed school parties holidays was scared to make plans to do anything fearing the pain pretty much went to bed with some degree of head pain and woke up with it everyday had no clue what it would be like to live without them sometime late in went to my pharmacy to pick us some prescritions that were not working anyway and one of the tech who suffered headaches constantly was smiling and seemed so different her eyes were wide open she seemed happy etc she told me her doctor had put her on elavil and within days her headaches subsided went straight to my pain management physician and asked for elavil two weeks later started going whole days without head pain went to sleep easily and slept till morning looked forward to doing things woke up without pain what miracle have probably had only two or three actual migraines in the last eight years when do get slight headache it usually disappears within short time without additional meds needless to say my entire life changed am better wife mother daughter friend take the generic and notice no difference from elavil thank you elavil
sideEffectsReview: none that noticed
commentsReview: i take one mg tablet of generic elavil at bedtime

commentsReview: i was skeptical that depression even existed so delayed my psych is advice in taking it for year got to the point felt so bad admitted had problem and began small dose of tablet once day that is all need for now too feel completely different from how did months ago have personality again the low days are not so low and do not paralyze me anymore my appetite is normal again after having none for months the only weight put on is what lost and that is because am feeling better and have my appetite back still underweight but am on the way to being healthy again feel more alive and positive do not feel so withdrawn guilty and ashamed for no reason it is not miracle pill and you have to do the work to get there but lexapro is helping me to get there will take it for as long as need to find good dr and please listen to them and take it if you need to do not live in misery because of the stigma society sometimes puts on mental health issues screw society and put your mental health first

commentsReview: i take one mg dose of methotrexate once week along with sulphasalazine and naproxen to reduce activity of my very active rheumatoid arthritis the pain and inflammation is still there but has reduced slightly also take bendroflumethazide to reduce high blood pressure taken on daily basis have researched on the internet and found need to increase my daily intake of water fluids this has never been mentioned in the contraindications or by my gp understand the reason for increasing fluid intake is because the medication take is cytoxic and need to keep my kidneys and liver flushed as much as possible which is why patients who take methotrexate and sulphasalazine have monthly blood tests
