benefitsReview: lifted depression calmed violent mood swings
sideEffectsReview: i have been lucky with side effects it has been entirely weight neutral which was big consideration for me had some very pleasant side effects when first started taking the drug vivid but enjoyable dreams and an increase in sexuality the only negative effects were sometimes having to reach to find the word was trying to use which has since lessened although it still happens occasionally and pretty bad acne which am now treating separately and is much better neither of those effects are on the pi sheet and my doctor seems very skeptical that either was caused by the drug but have found lots of anecdotal evidence of other people experiencing similar things regardless the effects have been minimal and well worth it considering how much have been helped
commentsReview: i started treatment when was in what seemed like mixed state barely able to leave my bed at times having to go into the bathroom at work to cry nearly every day having strong urges to self mutilate and having lot of suicidal ideation was also very agitated and angry lashing out at loved ones for seemingly no reason lamotrigine started lifting the depression almost immediately and once hit the theraputic dose of mg it was like cloud lifted overnight still have some ups and downs but nothing major and even when destructive thoughts cross my mind am able to push them away more easily have recently had rather intense relapse into bulimia but doubt that is related to the lamotrigine either way

sideEffectsReview: i have read that lot of people who take this are very tired and sleepy believe that everyone is body reacts differently to drugs as far as my side effects goes feel great almost natural high if you will am very talkative and focused will say that do not have much of an appetite my stomach feels fine and the lower pain has gone away for the most part do realize am taking more pills now because the effectivness has worn off bit doing my research on this have heard that being the case many times
commentsReview: overall am going to obgyn specialist next week and they are going to determine what is the exact problem as urgent care and the hospitalcould not figure it out which scares me truthfully hopefully will not have to take anything and the pain will go away recommend this to anyone who has moderate to severe pain as it has helped me dramatically good luck to all pain is not something wish on anyone

benefitsReview: since was very young child suffered debilatating headaches often they became true migraines they would last for days and days sometimes weeks without stop missed school parties holidays was scared to make plans to do anything fearing the pain pretty much went to bed with some degree of head pain and woke up with it everyday had no clue what it would be like to live without them sometime late in went to my pharmacy to pick us some prescritions that were not working anyway and one of the tech who suffered headaches constantly was smiling and seemed so different her eyes were wide open she seemed happy etc she told me her doctor had put her on elavil and within days her headaches subsided went straight to my pain management physician and asked for elavil two weeks later started going whole days without head pain went to sleep easily and slept till morning looked forward to doing things woke up without pain what miracle have probably had only two or three actual migraines in the last eight years when do get slight headache it usually disappears within short time without additional meds needless to say my entire life changed am better wife mother daughter friend take the generic and notice no difference from elavil thank you elavil

benefitsReview: i started topamax right after approval due to ongoing generalized grand mal seizures that were resistant to other drugs my epileptologist was hoping this would be the one we added it on to what was currently taking at the time tegratol and dilantin and crossed our fingers guess what after reaching mg day went from having generalized seizures week to total in many many years unfortunately continued having partial complex seizures until we found the dilantin lamictal topamax combo in the last years and still have or of those month really owe my life to topamax awesome drug awesome awesome awesome
sideEffectsReview: in the beginning remember getting topatingles or tingling in my fingers that hurt sometimes toes and even my lips lost lot of weight and have stayed in the underweight category ever since my memory vanished affectionately nicknamed this drug stupimax and dopamax got strange aches and pains in my bones joints and muscles was more sensitive to the sun and heat and my sweat was reduced frequently had runny nose and cough food tasted funny sex felt different not bad just different my skin was very sensitive to touch and my hearing was overactive my potassium kept testing deficient and had to be prescribed supplements my hair also fell out in clumps all that went away or got better with some time also found out why it was happening was malnourished once started drinking oz of water day taking multivitamin biotin for the hair issue eating potassium rich foods and more healthy diet all of sudden the side effects started to vanish still have dilantin side effects which are easy to distinguish as have been on that since but the topamax ones are gone barring once and awhile have bit of loss of words while speaking love this drug

benefitsReview: this anti depressant has basically saved my life have suffered with severe depression and anxiety since childhood whether these problems were caused by nature or nurture can be difficult to ascertain but in my particular case believe it was both while was victim of severe sexual physical and verbal abuse from very young age through my teen years also seem to have been born with an unusually isensitive disposition and can get very emotionally and mentally disturbed at times with very little provocation everyone who knows me well considers me very emotional person at any rate it has been the prozac that has helped me in dealing with the stresses of even everyday life first started feeling suicidal in adolescence and unfortunately this is still constant problem the prozac am convinced has helped me keep these feelings in check and although was just hospitalized for my depression late last year am still alive and kicking completely believe that it is the prozac that has saved my life before the advent of these types of antidepressants all that was available were the tricyclics those never worked for me the way the ssri is have although they did achieve in putting me into stupor like condition they never seemed to alleviate my depression the prozac does while it does not rid me of the problem completely it has been absolutely invaluable to me and believe it is the main reason am alive to write these words to you today am fortunate in that have never had single side effect from the prozac actually there has been complete loss of libido which could be major problem for alot of people for me however this is not problem because am celibate and have been for years trust me had enough sex in my younger years to last me for the rest of my life feel should mention that have known many people who take prozac and who have not had any sexual problems at all
sideEffectsReview: initial dosage was mgs each morning this dosage was sufficient for about years at which point it was raised to mgs each day ultimately the dosage was raised again approximately years after the first increase to my current dosage of mgs each day this is apparently the maximum dosage only side effect was loss of libido
commentsReview: basically you need to see psychiatrist as often as your condition requires also recommend concurrent visits with some type of therapist or counselor as this will increase the benefits you receive by taking the medication

benefitsReview: i have been plagued with peristent mutiple warts on my elbow for over years at christmas decided to attack the area again to clear it for the summer used the freezing technique but warts were clearly trying to spread outside the treated area onto fresh skin areas then added the salicylic acid to the new growths but this just made my arm skin sore could see the only solution was to control the virus itself to prevent any new spread as the thickened areas died off with the cryotherapy used thin smear of acyclovir around the treated areas and all the new wart blistering stoped iritating within an hour or so and died back if left the cream off they would start again persisted with the cream daily for weeks and for the first time in years or more my arm is wart free and have healthy unbroken wart free skin
sideEffectsReview: none in fact it gave great relief to sore irritated skin as new wart blister tried to form suggest clinical trial to be used in conjunction with cryotherapy to prevent spread and regrowth once warts are treated it is certainly more successful in eliminating emerging warts and preventing regrowth than the recommended salicylic acid which does more harm then good
commentsReview: this may be marketing oportunity for you as re growth is often more of problem than treating the original wart

benefitsReview: taking mg of warfarin sufficiently thinned my blood so that did not find it difficult to do everyday tasks immediately felt better after started the regimen in the spring of my cough went away and had lot more energy took this regimen for about years everyday also found it easier to concentrate and think what was doing before it it was as if my brain cleared up or something breathed easier and was more willing to tackle regular household chores worked over hours week before and during this treatment
sideEffectsReview: the side effects of warfarin on me did not become apparent until couple of years later started feeling weak and bruised easily acquired more broken blood vessels capillaries veins in my feet and calves was tired and started feeling cranky stopped taking warfarin for months but then went back to it after had the old feeling of thick blood during the months that was not taking warfarin felt better had more energy but then the downside my blood was getting too thick and was starting to get headaches so went back on it this time my doctor said might have to increase dosage to mg since had not been taking the warfarin however when had my thrombin checked was okay at mg took this for another months and then started feeling the old way and quit again the same scenario was repeated started feeling like had thick blood and now had increasingly bad headaches went back on mg of warfarin in august of this year but only took them for months then started vitamin mineral coq regimen and stuck with it and am still doing that credit most of the perfect blood feeling for lack of better term to vitamin and the fact that also changed my diet try to eat lot of veggies and fruits and have been vegetarian for almost two years not super strict but feel disgusted about eating meat and therefore never eat it unless it is buried in some food do eat salmon and tuna the final straw for me with warfarin was that started feeling really mad about things the littlest things would make me angry anger that was way out of proportion to the incident when my teenaged daughter started crying after ripped into her for staying longer at social visit and heard my words echoing in my house knew that was it quit warfarin and started taking mg of aspirin daily had headache every morning after went off warfarin started the vit min regimen in november gradually adding supplements as learned about their benefits but it was not until weeks ago that realized was not having any headaches and was able to stop taking mg of aspirin also since starting the stricter diet and the vit min supplements also some herbs have not had an anger fit of course am also more prone to control my anger because really did not like how had been do not feel depressed have told everyone in my family about this because it seems so remarkable why did not the doctors tell me

commentsReview: dose per day completely eliminated acid reflux from nexium take this medication by mouth usually once daily at least hour before meal or as directed by your doctor do not crush or chew the capsule swallow the capsule whole if you have difficulty swallowing this medication whole the capsule may be opened and the contents sprinkled onto soft food cold applesauce or yogurt or emptied into small amount of water orange juice or apple juice and taken as directed rinse the container with an additional small amount of liquid and drink the contents to make sure the entire dose is taken do not chew the food medication mixture or prepare supply in advance this may destroy the drug and or increase side effects if needed antacids may be taken along with this medication the dosage and length of treatment is based on your medical condition and response to therapy use this medication regularly in order to get the most benefit from it remember to use it at the same time each day continue to take this medication for the prescribed length of treatment even if you are feeling better inform your doctor if your condition persists or worsens

commentsReview: my father is in wheelchair for those of you with handicapped family and friends you know how difficult urinary tract infections can be ciprofloxin was major break through for uti is unfortunately paralyzed men and women have trouble holding their bowel movements due to the dumping effect of cipro releasing directly into the gut although not widely promoted just know that proquin xr has truly changed my father is life instead of being hospitalized once year due to uti he can now take proquin xr and continue on with his normal daily life work etc proquin xr basically allows the body to metabolize more of the medication and this in turn makes the medication more efficacious in layman is terms it works faster and more effectively if you have digestive issues due to cipro or any antibiotic you seriously need to try this medication it has not only helped my father but has made my family is life much easier

benefitsReview: i have taken various anti depressants through the years but this was the closest ever came to cure granted it was after stopped taking the medication that this cure took place but never experienced this with other anti depressants while taking it effexor made me so sleepy all the time that slept good deal more than normal hours daily this is why stopped taking it but when did felt better than had in years remained depression free for about years then dealt with depression again for about months did not want to lose another weeks taking the effexor cure so delayed hoping would just snap out of it on my own when finally conceded this was not going to happen returned to my doctor who then convinced me to try something new so tried cymbalta hoping to get effexor is benefits without the side effects it worked well as long as used it but when stopped there was no cure like would had with effexor now take mg of same it is not as good as the post effexor experience but feel less dependant on the medical system for my maintenance and focus on physical health good food exercise vitamins to maintain my emotional health those things alone unfortunately do not completely do it for me and that is where the same comes in it makes the difference
sideEffectsReview: as indicated in the question relating to treatment benefits the side effects of effexor for me were tendency to sleep lot and to feel sleepy much of the time
commentsReview: i began effexor under the care of psychiatrist who was treating me for depression my depression took the form of lack of interest in all aspects of my life and had begun to shut down to such degree that sometimes the act of just walking from the garage into my house required strong act of will when had to run errands like grocery shopping felt an uncomfortable detachment from my environment my treatment with effexor at worst sometimes simply took me down energy wise an additional notch from where was at best it shifted me from the uncomfortable detached feeling and elevated my mood couple of notches above where it had been had moments of feeling fully functional that was enough to give me sense of feeling better and the will to decide to take my full energy back that is when stopped taking it and experienced the miraculous cure if ever experience such deep depression again will choose to try the effexor again the original not the newer version rather than the cymbalta with the cymbalta would already know that the benefits would only last as long as chose to be on it whereas the effexor would give me hope for lengthy remission

commentsReview: the doc first suggested that take paxil every day for wks before speech and then get off it had to push her to prescribe me inderal instead because had researched all the drugs extensively and new what was looking for never rely entirely on the judgement of doctors always verify their advice and do your own research it can save you time money and alot of side effects take small tablets and hour before major speech or presentation about once year am thinking about using it for situational anxiety as another user suggested had never thought about it as try to stay as far from drugs as possible and only use them in extreme situations but have missed many networking opportunities because of my anxiety and think that this drug would have helped have not experienced any side effects do not think the drug has significantly risky long term effects think the long term negative effects of situational anxiety are far worse then the potential risks of inderal

benefitsReview: none especially surprising since the prescription name brand luvox had been used previously with great results the luvox stopped all ruminations and obsessive worry while the generic fluvoxamine seemed to do nothing and did not help with sleep
sideEffectsReview: some vague nausea which was not problem with the name brand drug
commentsReview: at the time of weaning my second child was apparently experiencing some hot flashes night sweats and worry panic and tried fluvoxamine the generic version of luvox which had used previously by about four years had successfully used luvox and was able to discontinue it without any side effects or symptoms of worry returning this time only the generic was available to me so tried it thinking that it would be the same drug and provide similar results it did not experienced nausea and did not get any sleep benefits although felt that the luvox had improved my sleep when taken at night neither version of the drug caused any drowsiness did not feel any improvement in symptoms with the generic version perhaps my hormones needed to balance on their own and were too intense for the fluvoxamine to modify hope there will be something better available if menopause eventually causes return of symptoms some generics are better than others and individual reactions differ it is useful to have this rating information available to access online

benefitsReview: our home was destroyed in the northridge earthquake before the earthquake was already experiencing depressive symptoms but was reluctant to take medication for it after the earthquake my doctor recommended give the antidepressants try for few months coupled with therapy to get me back on track about two weeks later found myself feeling good again in spite of my therapist telling me how screwed up my family was driving down the freeway singing at the top of my lungs and playing air drums on the steering wheel of my car the old me was back thanks to the medication was able to re organize my life and focus on moving ahead instead of being stuck knowing what things needed to be done but not having the drive or motivation to do them
sideEffectsReview: the sexual side effects ultimately led me stop taking the zoloft my husband and found it very frustrating that was unable to reach climax where before had been multi orgasmic because our sex life is very important to us this became an area of contention that found to be unacceptable my inability to reach orgasm was demoralizing for my husband feeling he could no longer please me and for me the frustration of it all made sex seem like too much work to bother with my libido came to screeching halt this depressed both of us so gradually weaned myself off the zoloft and shortly thereafter became pregnant with our first child one other thing about taking the zoloft was that after the elevated mood from the initial breakthrough of depression wore off found myself living life somewhere in the middle in addition to the lows no longer being depressingly low the highs were not as uplifting as before was in essence comfortably numb other side effects were dry mouth nausea weight gain and increased irritability although the later could have been due to the stress of our temporary living conditions
commentsReview: my primary care physician prescribed counseling and the antidepressant zoloft the plan was to take the medication for three to six months until felt was back on track and could maintain functional lifestyle without it started with mg every other day for five days then mg day for one week followed by mg day every day thereafter began therapy with psychologist once week where was diagnosed with ptsd strangely enough found the counseling to do more harm than good in this case partially because it made me see my childhood for what it really was did not find that to be helpful at the time had not been on anti depressants before went to counseling would have needed it afterward to deal with the emotional blows that had to face and could no longer ignore that drove me into depression in the first place

benefitsReview: i recently saw my pcp for my annual exam and had major concerns to discuss with her the first was some depression issues and the second was that had recently developed indoor allergies as is standard my pcp recommended antidepressants and therapy for the depression and claritin hr non drowsy for the allergies the problem is that am nursing my son and no antidepressants are safe for nursing mothers or rather for our nursing children on the other hand my md approved claritin although was nursing at the end of the session she told to to start on claritin and come back for the antidepressants once weened my son so started the claritin and my depression abated all of my depressive symptoms were relieved the inability to sleep at night but feelings of tiredness all day the aches the inability to concentrate since started taking claritin it was like switch was flipped and the quality of my life has increased significantly feel normal for the first time in long time in terms of my allergies the sneezing runny nose and watery eyes have lessened but my red eye concern the swelling and redness of the area surrounding my eyes has not been relieved regardless am happy with the product share this in the hope that some scientist out there uses this information to help our elusive understanding of depression and its treatment perhaps an alternative for postpartum depression many mother is feel guilty weening shortly after birth in order to treat their sadness and if claritin is approved by your md for use while nursing why not try it or even as an alternative to conventional depression meds

commentsReview: i have been on antidepression meds for years but my depression persisted regardless of the treatment used to sleep hours per day and was always tired and fatigued when awake was diagnosed with sleep apnea years ago but even sleeping with cpap did not help with my daytime fatigue after seeing many family practitioners finally broke down and invested in very well educated psychiatrist who diagnoed me with add since childhood his decision to prescribe vyvanse was brilliant feel better than ever and am totally clear headed and able to consentrate for the first time in as long as can remember can think normally no more racing thoughts in my head and my depression and anxiety has all but vanashed do still take an antidepressive but am certain that the vyvanse gave the antidepression meds the ability to work can finally sleep normal to hours and still be awake and alert throughout my hour work days was worried that the vyvanse would elevate my anxiety level but the opposite occured my anxiety is all but absent and no longer have the need to continue with my anti anxiety meds there is no substitute for doctor who is specialist in mental health spend the money and see good psychiatrist will spend hours with you before making diagnosis and if adult add is what you have then give vyvanse try it worked great for me and my live has turned around for the better it is the best remedy that have found in years you must take it when you awaken for your day because it takes about hours to get out of your system if you take it later in the day you will experaince insomnia ask your specialist about vyvanse

commentsReview: i was in an mva in in which suffered whiplash type injury which caused accelerated the ddd was prescribed percocette mg on an as needed basis for pain control after years of constant agonizing pain of being on the percocette they became ineffective at relieving pain and was referred to pain clinic specializing in chronic pain the doctors there decided that had built up tolerance dependence on the percocette and that it would be best to put me on longer acting narcotic oxycontin mg time released supposed to provide pain relief for hrs with percocette oxycodone mg acetaminophen mg for break through pain in the beginning the medication seemed to help but over time built up tolerance to the oxycodone they became less effective which meant had to keep increasing the dosage to get the same amount of pain relief for example started out with oxycontin mg x day and approx percocette daily couple of months later as my tolerance increased had to take oxycontin mg x day and percocette as the months passed by my tolerance grew and my dosage was increased after about months on the oxycontin started to experience all of the side effects mentioned above not only did notice the negative effects the drug was having on me but friends and family noticed too and mentioned not to me but amongst themselves that my appearance demeanor over the past yrs had dramatically changed couple of months ago my sister took me aside and asked me what was wrong to which replied nothing why she then explained to me how my behavior depression moodiness etc and appearance drastic weight loss had been getting worse and worse and told me that she was worried being under the influence of these drugs for so long felt like was in fog and really had no idea as to the extent of how bad it really was how looked so stepped back and examined the last yrs of my life while on these medications and realized that they had taken considerable toll on me emotionally physically mentally strongly advise that before anyone decides to go this route for pain management that you have long talk with your physician on the pros and cons of this medication specifically the oxycontin if would have known then what know now about all the negative side effects would never never had started taking it feel that it deteriorated my body especially my muscle mass and skin when started taking the medication was and felt and was told looked like was in my late is am now feel and now in an effort to spare my feelings people do not mention anything about how old look wish that my physicians would have told me about all of the negative effects of this medication instead of just the positive which are few in my opinion the negative far outweigh the positive am still in constant pain but will continue to search for pain management without drugs please use with caution

sideEffectsReview: i have already given this information xxxxxxxx osteoarthritis osteoarthritis begins with the breakdown of joint cartilage resulting in pain and stiffness oa commonly affects the joints of the fingers knees hips and spine other joints affected less frequently include the wrists elbows shoulders and ankles oa can also be caused by work related repetitive injury and physical trauma
commentsReview: i have already given this information xxxxxxxx rheumatoid arthritis rheumatoid arthritis causes inflammation of the joint lining called the synovium this type of arthritis can cause pain stiffness swelling warmth and redness the affected joint may also lose its shape resulting in loss of normal movement ra can affect other parts of the body as well including the blood the lungs and the heart rheumatoid arthritis is to times more common in women than in men and generally affects people between the ages of and however young children can develop form of ra called juvenile ra

benefitsReview: the medication helped to reduce the headache pain if not eliminate it completely was getting headache almost dailey it was affecting my job and family life my migraine would start with mild headache on the left side of my face and the pain would increase with time taking relpax at the onset really helped to slow down the pain and in most cases stop it

commentsReview: at the onset of the headache would take pill some of my headaches would start at night around am and would lay in bed hoping the pain would go away wrong decision quickly learned to take the pill as soon as felt any sign of headache no matter what time of day or night if you do not take the pill at the onset of headache the pill will not be effective in stopping the pain and you will have to ride the headache out that could take day to several days before the pain subsides it is extremely important to take this pill at the onset of headache

sideEffectsReview: fuzziness of thinking short term memory loss although this might be due to my fibromyalgia sexual disfunction ie inability to have full orgasm and after years of this thi sis one of the reasons why am ready to change to gabapentin as recommended by my doc sleepiness etc goes away after the first few weeks although it took me good months to properly adapt to this drug
commentsReview: mg at night for the first months then the pain came through again so upped this to mg per day six months ago wasn aware of any pain behind the pain that had been used to so thinking was maybe bit better cut the intake down to mg day by cutting my mg tablet in half each night this was fine until week ago when the shocking shooting pain returned accompanied by pin prick sensations on my face and on my limbs have not had thi sin years intend to try gabapentin now although some people have referred to it as the zombie drug my main reason for not upping the nortrip back to mg is that want to see if will be able to have an orgasm on the gaba although maybe this is luxury as anyone with nerve pain knows sex is the last thing on your mind when you are in such pain but who knows maybe will be able to be pain free and get my libido back

commentsReview: i had slight to moderate acne that was just really annoying and was not fixed by any type of treatment so finally gave in and went on accutane after reading all the online horror stories was scared out of my mind however had great experience on it took mg day for months and weigh lbs kgs so it was about mg day kg which is moderate to high dose was told my lips were pretty dry and cracked if did not put on chapstick all the time also had really dry skin if did not put lotion on my shoulders arms back and face after showering everything else was fine though no nosebleeds no depression no hair loss no unbearable side effects these horror stories are overblown and rare and tons of people have great results on it my acne is gone from all over my body and it is such relief to not have to deal with it on completion my dermatologist told me he has prescribed it for years and has never once had case of depression and only people have had bad blood tests if you are tired of acne give accutane shot if the sides are too rough in your case then you can go off of it but it is such great drug if it works for you the way it did for me and many others like me

commentsReview: i guess the treatment details are how take it the injections are deep subcutaneous because the drug is very hard on tissue you can not inject into the same area upper arms are divided into imaginary sections abdomen areas legs areas and buttocks so inject into first arm area on one arm then next injection opposite arm then abdomen legs and buttocks then you must start over in the first arm but different section and then work your way down again this keeps tissue necrosis from occuring the injections are every other night and come in pre measured syringe the must be mixed slowly with the powder immediately before injection make sure to not agitate the sol as it will foam then you can not get it in the syringe and then it is useless

benefitsReview: increased energy and memory levothyroxine treatment alone was not working well the combination works much better
sideEffectsReview: none
commentsReview: since being diagnosed with hypothyroidism my doctor would treat with basically the levothyroxine the levels would be increased until was in the range but never felt quite right was still very tired and my memory especially short term was really bad went to couple endocrinologists with the first one diagnosing the hypothyroidism as result of hashimoto disease even with this diagnosis the first endocrinologist did not suggest other treatments and continued to suffer with excessive tiredness and memory problems decided to go for second opinion and this endocrinologist told me that some individuals react better with combination treatment of levothyroxine and cytomel this seemed to turn me around the memory and tiredness have gotten better still not optimal it seems as long as one is in the range doctors are hesitant to push the envelope would like to see physicians listen to their patients and adjust the meds until they feel better not just go by the range

commentsReview: my family doctor prescribed it for panic attacks saw psychiatrist years ago but it really did not do much apart from giving me tips on what to do constructively if have panic attack which of course did not help because when you are paralyzed with fear you can not do much of anything constructive with your time

sideEffectsReview: when taking synthroid it must be taken on an empty stomach around the same time every day multivitamins with iron decrease the sythroids effectiveness so they must be taken at least hours after taking sythroid never miss dosage once missed few days in row and became very depressed almost suicidal will need to take sythroid for the rest of my life and keep regular appointments to have my thyroid levels checked

commentsReview: i have been taking minocycline mg twice day at first had no side effects what so ever however after week started heaving headaches and they gradually got worse it was when started having neck pains stopped using minocycline although stopped using it never thought the pains were due to it thought it was from going out right after the shower which often do that same night woke up with hives appearing in my body and towards the end of the day my face got swollen eyes and my inner lip at first thought it was food allergy went to the doctor and got full blood test white blood cells red cells cholesterol sugar full allergy almost everything during the waiting period of my results took about week and half was taking steroid pills for allergies and got back to normal within days on the th day was like hmm lets take minocycline again wanna be proactive and not break out on acne again took one pill at night after days of not using it and the next day got itchy hands and few hives and then realized it was the minocycline that was reacting to luckily only took one pill and over the counter allergy medicine such as zyrtec got rid off my itchiness and am back to normal again so around days later after gave blood the results came to my doctor to my surprise everything came normal no allergies what so ever no pollen no nuts no nuts no dust completely no allergies my red blood cell count along with hematocrit came little high but nothing else am almost confident to say that minocycline was what was reacting to and my doctor told me to stop taking it

benefitsReview: this drug definately does have an effect on depression went on trip and while had enough for the duration of the trip ran out the day returned and was unable to get the refill for several days noticed significant change in my mood and affect and began experiencing symptoms of depression again although tried to keep stiff upper lip my husband noticed the change

commentsReview: overall feel that my treatment with this drug has been successful have not experienced any sexual side effects which know can occur with some antidepressants my libido is exactly the same as it was before my depression and before began taking this drug know that this drug can also cause decrease in appetite as well as the urge to smoke my husband and both smoke and do smoke less when he is not home he is not on any medications and so he will frequently ask me if want to go outside with him and smoke usually not always say yes for the companionship but sometimes decline when he is not home will smoke approximately cigarettes in an hour period used to be pack day smoker overall feel that this is useful drug for depression began taking it after my father died he battled cancer for years and took care of him the entire time his loss was debilitating to me no pill is going to change what went through or how feel but this drug has helped me explore some of the painful feelings that go along with his death without coming unglued my doctor prescribed this for me and at the same time switched me from ortho tricyclen which was highly loyal to to loestrin fe must say that between these two drugs physically feel ten years younger am but feel again overall would rate this drug as successful for me and will continue on it as long as my doctor and feel is appropriate for me

benefitsReview: within days my skin became visibly smoother pore size was markedly reduced very quickly and after just few weeks there was increased firmness and generally younger looking skin crows feet and forehead lines also diminshed skin strength was greatly improved and did not need to where make up to hide imperfections as much my skin looked more polished

commentsReview: a dermatologist prescribed retinova and told me that the longer used it the better the results would be this proved to be correct he told me to mix pea sized portion with my usual moisturiser but to only use it once day used it at night he also stipulated that it was very important to use an effective sun block as retinova increased sensitivity to sunlight number of people commented on the improvement in my skin after about months large brown patch of sun damage on my temple flaked off and did not come back was very disappointed when went to get my usual month prescription and was told that retinova was no longer available have subsequently used retin but without the same visible results this was not prescribed by the original dermaltologist he did not believe retin was suitable for what wanted to achieve for my skin over the counter products containing retinol do help smoothness little but nothing compared to the dramatic changes experienced when used retinova what amazed me the most was how quickly some of the changes occurred within only matter of days

sideEffectsReview: slight mental and phyical sedation positive effect for me but be careful if you need to be alert g driving slight mental fog for couple of hours on higher dose would not choose this particular benzodiazepine if felt anxiety at work as would not be able to concentrate up to the standard required but perfect for every other situation
commentsReview: it is long lasting nature often means that if am experiencing anxiety only one dose is enough to last through the night into the next day and often it seems as though the body remembers and stores this relaxation so another dose is not necessary only take when needed which can mean go months without dose this is important as for me personally if see valium and other benzodiazepine drugs as long term life treatment its vital not to become addicted and dependant as this not only means needing drug to function shackled by drug rather than using its benefits when really needed but if your body has constant daily dosing for months or years your brain stopped producing natural relaxation chemicals meaning that you need more and more of the drug to get the same benefit and also because of this after years of high dosage extreme withdrawal symptoms can occur while the brain starts to produce these chemicals again

sideEffectsReview: although some stress was alleviated noticed that spent more time in vegetative state am normally very active person who enjoys exercising daily while on lexapro found myself preferring to just relax and watch televison did cause slight weight gain due to this more serious and traumatizing side effects was the sudden onset of severe chest pain rapid heartbeat dizzy spells sweating fatigue numbness in legs and nausea the first episode occurred one day at work causing an ambulance to be dispatched to job from that day on these attacks happened quite frequently my doctor took me off the medicine however these attacks continued to occur for over year later never happened to me before lexapro in fact these effects started two year long string of attacks visits to cardiologists emergency rooms my fear of exercising as increased activity seemed to affect my heart and induce rapid heart beat began to fear driving as my dizzy spells would occur for no apparent reason as well as the numbness in my legs no doctor was much help in fact often got treated as if was crazy and was just told that am suffering from panic attacks understand that panic attacks can occur out of nowhere in ones life and once you have them you may experience continued anxiety believe the lexapro opened this pandoras box for me though read somewhere that an earlier version of lexapro or similar type of pill caused heart problems thus was pulled off the shelves who knows the story behind that it has taken me two long horrific years to get back on track am now approaching my issues naturally and am doing better not to say this completely stopped my life but it did seriously change it

commentsReview: i have taken chantix for months and would recommend this cessation method to anyone who is motivated to quit smoking even if you have slight desire to quit then this drug is for you but only if the following conditions apply you are in good mental health you are not in high stress environment mean like combat or fight fires for living you can accept feeling uncomfortable for about weeks while your body adjusts to the drug if you are seeing someone for mental issues then this drug is not for you if you are in high stress environment then leave this drug alone if you cannot handle nausea constipation insomnia or fatigue for extended periods of time then do not take this drug the nausea will fade but it can get pretty intense and that seems to be the deal breaker for lot of people can hack lot before cry uncle but let me tell you the nausea will come in waves and will wear you down but in the end it was worth it

benefitsReview: venlafaxine is bicyclic antidepressant and is usually categorized as serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor snri but it has been referred to as serotonin norepinephrine dopamine reuptake inhibitor it works by blocking the transporter reuptake proteins for key neurotransmitters affecting mood thereby leaving more active neurotransmitters in the synapse the neurotransmitters affected are serotonin hydroxytryptamine and norepinephrine noradrenaline additionally in high doses it weakly inhibits the reuptake of dopamine with recent evidence showing that the norepinephrine transporter also transports some dopamine as well implying that snris may also increase dopamine transmission this is because snris work by inhibiting reuptake e preventing the serotonin and norepinephrine transporters from taking their respective neurotransmitters back to their storage vesicles for later use if the norepinephrine transporter normally recycles some dopamine too then snris will also enhance dopaminergic transmission therefore the antidepressant effects associated with increasing norepinephrine levels may also be partly or largely due to the concurrent increase in dopamine particularly in the prefrontal cortex
sideEffectsReview: difficulty in reaching orgasm increased amount of ejaculate rare mild headache
commentsReview: my uptake levels were not severely out of balance started with mg and felt the positive effects in minutes was told it would take week reduced the dosage to mg then mg after six months because felt those doses to be too strong know others that found this drug helpful others it had no effect on at all even at doses of mg

benefitsReview: i have had svt is all my life it was only when turned that sought treatment for them as they usually were linked with syncope episode was originally put on the grandfather of beta alpha blockers inderal while this drug was effective at treating my migraines it was not particularly effective at controlling my palpitations and it tended to lower my blood pressure too much always felt tired and had little energy on this drug at years of age was not happy to have the energy of year old next came atenolol and labatolol when was pregnant also had break through palpitations with these drugs as well as low enegy side effects with labetolol could barely jog down my street without becoming significantly winded and according to my cardiologist fell into the th percentile for in shape people my age finally when bystolic hit the market was thrilled first of all did not need large dose of it to be effective second it was effective experience no break through palpitations and last but not least there were very few to no side effects had energy again and could get throught my cardiovascular exercise without becoming winded
sideEffectsReview: the beta blocker controls and regulates your heart beat so it beats on time when it is supposed to it also however controls your heart rate and does not allow it to race out of control so when exercising many people have hard time being able to get their heart rate up to pump enough blood to the lungs which is why you feel winded while exercising even mildly with bystolic there is very little of this type of side effect sometimes do not notice it at all
commentsReview: i take mg of bystolic one time per day to control palpitations this drug is commonly prescribed for hypertension but do not take it for that at this dose it does not lower my already low blood pressure very much but it is effective against the palpitations

commentsReview: i was diagnosed with moderate to severe case of gerg with an esophageal hernia over years ago and spent two years at physicians request trying mix of different otc drugs no otc drug worked to stop the burning and the coughing after meals caused by gerd tried most everything you would find in the otc shelf in drug store tums zantac etc etc etc finally doctor ordered prilosec for me day mg taken in am before eating at that time prilosec with still not yet over the counter still requiring physician prescription it worked beautifully and have taken it since daily if do not take it symptoms immediately occur after eating it does not however stop the cough that occurs after eating or otherwise from gerd recently have had to increase my dose occasionally to pill also before dinner but that is usually only if am eating later than expected have never taken nexium the hmo did not cover it but since prilosec works so well do not feel the need to experiment

benefitsReview: lyrica reduced the pain associated with my anklosing spondylytis when other therapies had failed had tingling numbness pain and very limited movement in my arms and legs from s after developing moderate sized bone spurs on my cervical spine it was severely limiting my ability to have any sort of life have tried almost every form of pain killer from otc to narcotics with very limited effects lyrica works differently and find that can be relatively pain free it does not totally eliminate the pain but what it does is make it bearable so that can function could take more of it according to my doctor but am more comfortable taking the lowest possible dose have noticed that have no more tingling very little numbness and greatly expanded range of motion without pain highly recommend this drug
sideEffectsReview: the treatment side effects are somewhat severe the first dose took almost immediately knocked me out was so out of it loopy sleepy etc that all could do is sit around and then go to sleep it did not get better after couple of doses and originally stopped taking it my doctor helped me build up tolerance by stepping up the dosage over week or so that limited the side effects but still find that if miss dose by even couple of hours start going through withdrawal and start feeling awful do not feel better until get the dose that is somewhat scary to me and keeps me from trying higher dose but the benefits of having normal life outweigh the side effects and dont know of any safer options to do that
commentsReview: treatment details guess you are asking for how often etc am on ongoing therapy take one in the morning and one in the evening try to keep my dosage schedule very precise because pretty quickly show signs of withdrawal if miss any it has allowed me to start physical therapy which was previously unavailable because of the pain feel much better but this is an ongoing disease that is not curable only controllable so do not know what the future holds and if the treatment will change

benefitsReview: i have been able to maintain sobriety and get my life back on track methadone has allowed me to get my bearings underneath me and really focus on what is important in life once again after about months began working and have been promoted consistently since then am currently tapering and am really trying to be smart about it while am very eager to be off methadone also do not want to rush it feel that methadone should be one of the last options person looks to when trying to stop opiate use because it is not something that can be stopped whenever person feels ready have found it to be quite complex task
sideEffectsReview: weight gain weight gain weight gain do not know if it is just because of the methadone slowing your metabolism or if it is caused by the need to eat sweets but have gained at least lbs since starting methadone years ago it is likely combination of both have also seen sever decline with my teeth and the only cause can think of is methadone have taken such good care of my teeth as far as self care and making sure see the dentist every months and that still has not helped has anyone else noticed this have started having sever pain in my joints as well especially my knees can honestly say though that without this medication probably would not be alive to experience any of these minor side effects without doubt methadone along with the therapy received while in the clinic and my families support has saved my life will take the weight gain and minor discomfort any day at least am here to write about it
commentsReview: i had tried many times to get sober before beginning mmt started methadone after unsuccessful tries at in patient and outpatient therapy when first began treatment traveled hours day to received the dosage after about year was lucky enough to get in to clinic closer to my home but by that time had completed all of the necessary counseling hours and had also received all clean swabs and urine tests and was given day take homes eventually that was extended to days which is the most in my state or clinic that you are allowed it has been about years now and am in total good place in life and feel that it is time to start tapering have held the same job for almost years have car have my finances somewhat in order and am ready to move on to the next phase while have had relatively easy time of tapering had to stop for couple of weeks because started feeling some slight stomach cramping and body aches made the decision to go down mgs week in hopes that such small amount per week would allow my body to easily adjust to the change so far so good and am hoping that by next summer will be completely done

benefitsReview: i am less angry sleep little better much less anxious am able to play with the kids without unhappily obsessing over all the things should be working on can just chill out and be in the moment

commentsReview: clinical depression runs in my family my sister was clinically depressed at the age of she and were both sensitive angry sad and sometimes suicidal have just lived with it not really taking meds much have to notice difference in few days if am going to stick with something my aunt told my sister that the people in our family do well on paxil my sister felt that it worked for her for year or two so started taking it because it has reached point where have to be happy or die from stress the paxil had noticeable effect on my anxiety levels in matter of days and an effect on my level of general happiness in matter of week or two the doctor prescribed mg which just can not take because it makes me too sleepy the next day take mg which was enough for the first month now mg is almost not enough can feel the anxiety there sometimes but more paxil will make me sleepy my year old son inherited the family depression problem he is been talking about killing himself and others he started taking paxil also have noticed big difference he is not angry so much anymore it is helping us truly usually will not take prescriptions think they make people sicker sometimes will keep taking this stuff as long as the benefits outweigh the problems

benefitsReview: a dramatic decrease in the level of depression and great increase in feeling of well being and hope for the future there were also considerable cognitive benefits thought processes speeded up memory became stronger and intellectual creativity increased also the constant fatigue that accompanied the depression decreased and this made possible an exercise program that increased energy and enjoyment of strenuous activities in addition my general and social anxiety decreased dramatically
sideEffectsReview: the most troublesome side effect was faintness upon rising quickly from seated or horizontal position on one occasion lost consciousness and fell however this side effect went away after three months or so there was also some decrease in sexual desire but this side effect also lessened over time side effect that seems to be permanent is lower blood pressure but this is actually benefit for most people have been told that some people take maoi is solely to decrease their blood pressure
commentsReview: it takes some time to build up to clinical dosage as recall my doctor had me take mg for weak mg for two weeks mg for two weeks until had built up to mg did not begin to feel the antidepressant effect until reached mg when reached mg the antidepressant effect had kicked in fully and even experienced period two or three weeks of mild euphoria which have been told is fairly typical my doctor thought that slow buildup of the drug in my system was the most effective treatment he also had me taking lamictal mg per day which he thought might spark stronger reaction to nardil there are also some diet restrictions no aged cheeses and no aged meats also some cold medications must be avoided

commentsReview: i was put on zoloft while still in the hospital having suffered traumatic brain injury was just taking whichever pills the doctors set out for me and when left the hospital just continued taking zoloft because knew was going to be depressed continued taking it for about year and half after leaving the hospital but eventually wanted to try living with clear mind when stopped the dosage gradually as one is well advised went on living ok but was still depressed was looking for something to take my mind off the recovery so of course dabbled in alcohol and the occasional marijuana use but eventually went on to realize that did not need any drugs at all there is something to be said for natural high but decided to put myself back on the lowest dose of zoloft in hopes of clearing my mind so that could go back to school without the depression hampering my focus

commentsReview: my neurologist that prescribed the med told me to see my primary gyn if symptoms are not gone week after discontinuation is not that nice live in rural town and do not have an established gyn right now so it just is not good situation beware

benefitsReview: my migraines did decrease significantly while on this medication there was clear inverse correlation between my neurontin dosage and my migraine frequency and severity more neurontin fewer migraines
sideEffectsReview: i was zombie some aspects of this subsided over the first year however others did not my vocabulary suffered horribly and never really recovered went from being very well spoken person to someone struggling to grasp some words over three letters coworkers even mentioned to me that they noticed this effect my memory suffered horribly as well would have to cut back on my dosage during exam times was in school as well as working at the time there seemed to be absolutely no way for me to memorized the volume of work needed to while on this drug the sleepiness experienced was awful this diminished somewhat but never entirely over the four years took it couple of times had to pull over while driving staying awake seemed to be out of my control entirely the sleepiness was overwhelming at times once fell asleep while speaking one on one with coworker while on neurontin also had an annoying tendency to forget what was saying mid sentence very embarrassing in professional setting since abandoning neurontin and switching to lamictal no longer have this problem
commentsReview: used as migraine prophylactic my dr simply increased my dosage over time from what believe was mg per day up to over approximately two months was to take the medicine throughout the day but sometimes opted to take bulk of the total dose at night before bed the fatigue it produced in me did assist my sleep unfortunately no matter when took it my sleep was also assisted while in my car or at my desk at work this decreased over time but was still in certain circumstances danger will say however it did decrease my migraines the greater my neurontin dose the less my migraines but opted to take my migraines over falling asleep driving possibly killing others or myself unfortunately my physician did not take this side effect seriously the many times told her after three years of this she continued to insist this side effect would subside it did lessen but never subsided to safe level she is no longer my physician and now take lamictal

benefitsReview: i took alprazolam for months for extreme anxiety depression it did work considerably in the beginning however would occasionally sleep the day away if taken in the morning would wake up from naps with terrible disposition it did work considerably for anxiety initially but it is very easy to self medicate and take considerably highger dosages then prescribed in retrospect should not have taken the medication because was already on medication to come off of opiates because have an addictive personality discussed this with my dr and he told me that alprazolam with suboxone worked well together later found out that the two drugs were dangerous to take together because of the potential of respiratory depression also have found out that benzodiazepines especially alprazolam can be very addictive which can have much worse withdrawal than any opiate think alprazolam can be very useful medication if taken as prescribed and only taken on prn basis do not believe there are any instances where alprazolam should be taken twice day unless you have signs of extreme anxiety all day every day if you have an addictive personality like myself think if you consider alprazolam at all it should be used very judiciously but exhaust other alternatives to alprazolam like buspar which has no addiction potential however think it tends to be pretty much useless unless taken in high dosages suggest talking to two or more dr before initiating regimen only say this because know what alprazolam withdrawal entails and there are very unpleasant side effects which can be life threatening also alprazolam is not effective for very long it is really only good for extreme panic attacks and helps quickly then it loses its effect within approx hours will also say gladly that have known people who have taken alprazolam for several years and only for extreme panic attacks and none of them have developed dependency on them the bottom line is you know you are propensity to addiction use your own common sense and if prescribed have the dr start you on mg the lowest dose and you should see great difference in your anxiety especially if your body is not accustomed to benzodiazepines best of luck

benefitsReview: it reduces the frequency of episodes of relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis
sideEffectsReview: the most common side effects are reactions at the injection site which have had especially at the beginning of treatment these are redness lump or firmness soreness or itching at the site of injection once developed permanent depression at an injection site which is caused by localized destruction of fat tissue some patients never have develop short term reaction experienced immediately after injecting this medicine this reaction includes feeling of warmth and or redness known as flushing chest tightness or pain with heart palpatations anxiety and trouble breathing these symptoms may last few minutes then go away by themselves without any further problems each package of copaxone contains complete list of possible side effects or you may obtain this list from your doctor or pharmacist
commentsReview: each single use blister pack of copaxone contains one prefilled syringe containing mg of copaxone glatiramer acetate which the patient self administers subcutaneously in the fatty layer of skin once day it is important to rotate injection sites daily

commentsReview: i was very skeptical about taking seasonique because some friends of mine had taken it in the past and did not have good experiences however had always experienced heavy periods and cramping even after trying different birth controls so decided to give it try my doctor assured me that seasonique was safe and should not have any severe side effects after only couple weeks started experiencing headaches and extreme breast tenderness did not think much of it at first but then started experiencing more side effects have been blessed with great skin only having few pimples throughout my lifetime however after being on seasonique for about month started to notice my skin was frequently breaking out did not want to stop taking birth control so figured would give it little bit longer to adjust to my body about month and half into taking seasonique began to breakthrough bleed had full blown period for exactly weeks consulted my doctor about week into the period and she assured me it was totally normal while on seasonique could definitely feel significant changes in my body that were not normal for me for these reasons would not recommend seasonique to anyone

commentsReview: i was prescribed this drug for insomnia my md told me that it had been used as an anti depressant but did not work well for that but was good for insomnia she originally prescribed mg and suggested work up from that if was ineffective am very drug sensitive so when mg really knocked me out and could barely wake up the next day cut the pills in half and that seemed to work but just gradually got the effects mentioned above realized later that had taken the same drug higher dose under the name desyrel when was for post partum depression it did not work and it made my blood pressure go down the number remember is same reaction very sedated confused etc would never have taken it but it was not identified as desyrel even on the pharmacy information sheet so did not realize what it was the weird thing about this drug for me is that it makes me so confused but subtly that can not think clearly enough to realize what is happening until it gets pretty bad know am very sensitive and this may be completely idiosyncratic reaction but do not think so when talked to the pharmacist about it she said yeah some people just can not take it know people who take mg night and they are fine

benefitsReview: remission of crohn is disease remission included normal bowel movenments from about day to or per day cramps associated with diarrhea have disappeared increased energy feeling active and generally feeling better endoscopy was done at one point after the treatment and there was indication of only very mild disease so basically remission was achieved according to my gastroenterologist
sideEffectsReview: edema weight gain round face occurring about weeks into the treatment insomnia headache and hperactivity occurred at mg daily and subsided when dose decreased to mg daily was first diagnosed with crohn is in and at that time not too much was known about effective treatments and so on my gastroenterologist at the time prescribed mg of prednisone daily for an indefinite period of time this did not help at all in fact became sicker and sicker lost lot of weight and had frequent diarrhea and severe cramps all day became osteopenic and had bowel perforation years later the perforation was believed to be due to the long term prenisone was taking had bowel resection done new gastroenterologist started me on new treatment schedule
commentsReview: the new treatment schedule started with qam for week decrease to mg for week and then slowly keep decreasing by mg daily for week at time until finished usually takes about month only needed to take prednisone about once year when flare ups occurred remission periods between flareups became further and further apart as became older often years so am no longer osteopenic as result

sideEffectsReview: it is very strong opioid which is highly sedating especially in combination with other drugs that can cause drowsiness even though am very opioid tolerant it was still sedating for me in addition to causing drowsiness and fatigue it tends to be highly habit forming because of the strength and nature of the drug the human body becomes physically dependent on it which has few implications first it loses efficacy over time meaning you need to keep increasing the dosage over time to maintain the same effectiveness the other issue with physical dependence is withdrawal had severe physical withdrawal symptoms if waited too long to change the patch starting day or so after was scheduled to change it and becoming more and more severe with time several specialists saw actually recommended hospitalization for controlled dose reduction as the safest way to stop taking fentanyl patches because they cause such severe physical withdrawal symptoms withdrew from it completely times and suffered severe debilitating symptoms for the first couple of weeks each time with decreasingly severe symptoms lasting for over month after stopped using it although have never had an issue with psychological dependence on any drug think it is important to mention that this one can be very addictive meaning that those who take it frequently develop psychological dependence especially if the user is prone to substance abuse

commentsReview: i took singulair for years before realized that it was not really doing much and strongly suspect that it contributed to my severe depression and mood swings have always had severe asthma and allergies and was hospitalized many times as youngster did have allergy shots which truly think helped with my allergies when got older and inhaled cortisteroids were invented started taking them along with singulair was told that it was the most benign medication that was on so never thought twice about popping that small pill each day suffered from frequent chest infections that is side effect of the singulair since it blocks the leuketrines that react and cause inflammation when was started having severe mood swings and had to start taking an anti depressant continued the singulair without any thoughts however after my third child we were broke and was trying to cut some medications down to save money and stopped the singulair for while did notice that my asthma got worse so figured oh well have to start the singulair again that is when started having the severe mood swings again started doing some research online and read an article written by mother who lost her son to suicide and attributed it to the singulair in my heart of hearts truly believe that more attention should be given to this drug and it is affects on the brain am no longer taking it and am having much better luck with zyrtec

benefitsReview: relief from hip and shoulder pain tingling painful feet in the mornings when would first walk around also received relief from lower back pain and as such allowed for better sleep to occur there is also comfort in knowing that as my illness progresses and as age that relief is out there for me when and if choose to use it again
sideEffectsReview: soemtimes the skin where the patch was placed became sore itchy red and inflamed however the most problematic side effect was during the transition phase between each day prescription for example if the pharmacy did not have the product would have to go without patch for day or two would experience withdrawal symptoms jitteriness crawling skin sleeplessness with dizziness the whole ordeal of getting in to see the doctor every days getting the prescription well it all was getting so stessful just went cold turkey and quit using them which by the way was pretty foolish because had difficult three days by myself to say the least
commentsReview: i was having considerable hip and shoulder pain also had significant sciatic pain but the sciatica pain was not as chronic as the shoulder pain while using the fentanyl patch was given facet block injections and as result have had little problem with the sciatica the fentanyl patch also relieved tingling pins and nnedle like pain in my feet that had in the mornings when first woke up and put even little of my weight down on my feet for me the patches served me for the time that was using them am however glad that for now do not currently use them

benefitsReview: am having very crisp vision ability increased moments of clarity thought seems much better heart and leg irritation nerves calmed back to normal what remember normal as still have moments where hyperthyroidism hits but this is early in treatment however this drug took me from very poor life oversleeping shaky blurred vision trembling hands heart jumping out of chest life and has made me feel very very normal
sideEffectsReview: the side effects are not seen if any because if the exist they are better than this incredible terrifying experience of hyperthyroid episodes that were haunting and devistated my life in many areas am drinking fluids one of my side effects of the hyperthyroid was not being able to eat or hold down food but very hungry all the time am on liquids and increase to solids slowly now
commentsReview: i saw my primary doc and er doctor all to be diagnosed as panic attacks lived on and off of valum and other anti depressants and nothing would ever control only blanket my tremors and shaky clouded mind one er doctor decided to run the thyroid tests that came back positive for hyperthyroidism saw specialist who then immediately put me on methimazole mg time day untile iodine test can be done delerious as was over week ago held couch in lost world of confusion tonight my ears stopped popping ringing is gone heart beating nice for this night believe that the methimazole is starting to work am not tired and feel like going outside unbelievable if this is the beginning to my life back this drug has the key to sanity for the upcoming choices for long term treatment and care must make soon note due to contrast given in cat scan must wait weeks to undergo the iodine testing understood that the contrast would throw off test results assume or am prepared for relapse because this is very short time into treatment but if this is glimps of what clarity is ahead wonderful drug to be treated with

sideEffectsReview: severe grogginess often accompanied by lightheadedness upset stomach nausea all aggravated by sleep loss or lack of food become slightly less severe after would been on it again for couple of weeks severe grogginess was slightly alleviated by caffeine espresso or some rest nap or both best solution appears to be to take the meds with or after food and to attempt to get decent amount of sleep also notice certain level of dependence not actual addiction though mostly due to return of symptoms in medication is absence may also have dry mouth but am not sure if that is the meds or if am not drinking enough water
commentsReview: best way have discovered to eliminate the side effects is to eat protein rich breakfast usually egg ham cheese sandwich for me then wait for at least few minutes anywhere from to or more before taking the medication seems to retain efficacy completely eliminate stomach problems and greatly reduce grogginess though that also seems to be partly dependent on how much sleep get minimum of hours preferably or now that discovered this trick am feeling much better and no longer considering abandoning the medication like that it helps with sleeping quality on top of helping me focus remember and feel more aware of surroundings would cry now if had to go back to not using it almost can not function without medication and the non stimulant allows me to sleep so much better and do not crash from it

commentsReview: i was on zoloft for about years total am extremely sensitive to medication so started at dose of mgs and slowly titrated up to mgs was unaware that this was probably too high of dose for me it subsequently caused me to start taking other prescriptions to mitigate some side effects my doctor prescribed ritalin and focalin for the lethargy and fatigue side effects that experienced during the day and ambien for the insomnia that zoloft caused am still on ambien to this day the worst effect of zoloft came when tried to get off of it it was total utter hell have since found out that this is euphemistically called discontinuation syndrome first cut the dose down to mgs and did not experience problems then slowly titrated down over several months until came off of it completely over the next few weeks started experiencing strange tingling sensations down my body panic attacks which had never experienced before and extreme nausea which became so bad lost pounds in weeks this was all extremely traumatic as am type diabetic who needs to eat to balance the insulin take the panic attacks got so bad had to be on xanax xr everyday for months could not function normally or work tried to stick it out because did not want to go back on an ssri after all the trouble and side effects it caused went to md who was also an alternative care specialist thinking he could give me st johns wort and could manage with that until got over the physical side effects of the ssri but it did not work eventually had to go back on an ssri just to function normally am on lexapro now managed to be drug free for the first years of my life except for insulin and now because of the aftermath of zoloft am on ambien lexapro and valium occasionally for anxiety to top that off the alternative doctor put me on supplement that ended up being an anabolic steroid which he called nutritional supplement and ended up having to go on even more medication to fight the side effects that incurred from that all because of zoloft will regret taking it the rest of my life
